It puffs up gently at the shoulders (the ruffle embellishments give it an extra feminine feel) and fits like your favorite college sweatshirt (roomy and relaxed), but with a look that’s more in line with your best-loved blouse (note the pleated-back detail). In other words, it’s a decidedly pulled-together pullover you’ll reach for constantly.75% polyamide, 25% elastaneMachine wash warm on gentle cycle, lay flat to dryMade in USAMeasurements (from size S): 18.75" chest, 24.74" sleeve length, 22.25" body length, 20.25" waistModel is 5’9.5" with 33" bust, 25" waist, 33.5" hips and wearing a size XS

description: Our Loretta Bootie is a glamorous take on the classic cowboy boot, complete with a sharp pointed toe and a towering stiletto heel. The Western-style detailing makes them a standout pair that you'll love wearing with jeans and dresses, alike. Available in Leopard.

name: Carla Crew-Neck Tee
description: Metal crest buttons give a stylish finish to our Carla T-shirt, making it a tee that's anything but basic. The soft crew-neck style is easy and effortless for every day, while the button accents deliver a dose of our signature glamour.

name: Eden Blouse
description: Our Eden Blouse in tonal floral jacquard exudes romantic, feminine style. The wrap blouse also features puffed shoulders and self-ties at the waist, adding to its elegant appeal and look. Wear with wide leg trousers and sharp pumps for sophistication at its finest.

name: Lexi Bootie
description: Our ode to the Wild West, the Lexi Bootie is a modern take on the classic cowboy boot. Featuring a stiletto heel and sharp pointed toe, this bootie promises to make a statement.

name: Lemongrass Jumpsuit
description: Pretend you've got your act together. This is a deep v-neck jumpsuit with a detached belt, a hook and eye closure at the chest and kimono sleeves. The Lemongrass is relaxed fitting throughout the bodice and leg with a fitted waist.

name: Liza High Straight Crop
description: They do wonders for your butt and Mother Earth. This is a high rise, cropped stretch jean with a straight leg and finished hem. The Liza is fitted throughout the hip and butt with an easy fitting leg.

name: Ravello Skirt
description: In our playful wallflower print, the Ravello Skirt features our signature side ruching along with ruffle detailing and a flattering fit. A thick elastic grosgrain underneath provides added support. The mini style pairs well with boxy sweaters and sleek pumps, delivering a fashion-forward look that works for dinner and beyond.

name: Merci Blouse
description: With retro vibes and a modern sensibility, the Merci Blouse makes a chic partner to the season's high-waist skirts and shorts. The cropped silk design features cap sleeves and notched lapels. Available in White.

name: Tristen Blouse
description: Our silk Tristen Blouse features a timeless tie neck accent, along with an effortless and fluid fit. Delicate pleats at the high neck add subtle style. Pair the elegant piece with relaxed denim for a high-low effect. Available in Black and Blush.

Wear with distressed jeans and sleek heels to complete elegance-meets-edgy look we all love.

description: There are only a few great coats you need to build a solid foundation of outerwear and FRAME's belted camel coat is a worthy addition to your closet. Made from durable double-faced cotton, it has a relaxed, menswear-inspired appeal that looks just as good left open as it does cinched closed. Layer yours over neutral separates for a failsafe ensemble.

name: Les Second - Medium
description: Minimal, Modern Styling Meets Refined Luxury In Our Les Second Cabas Tote. Crafted From Exquisite Leather, This Structured Handbag Is Equipped With Adjustable High-Polish Peg And Buttonhole Double-Drop Handles, A Center Welt Seam, Detachable Pouch, And FRAME Logo Discreetly Embossed At The Top.

name: Le High distressed straight-leg jeans
details:
Fits true to size, take your normal size
Those with curvy hips may wish to take the next size up
High-rise, cut for a straight-leg fit
Mid-weight, slightly stretchy fabric
Model is 180cm/ 5’11” and is wearing a size 26
description: Blue denim 94.98% organic cotton, 3.88% recycled polyester, 1.14% elastane Button and concealed zip fastening at front Designer wash: Hagen Imported

name: Le Brigette Triple Tie Waist Denim Shorts
description: A stacked waistband cinched with a tie belt highlights the super-high silhouette of these stretch-softened denim cutoffs in a summery white hue.

name: Le High Straight
description: With a high rise, this tailored straight-leg jean is designed to be subtly fitted with a nip-in at the knees. Featuring a clean hem, try this pair at work with smart tops and blazers.

name: Fray Edge Satin Camisole
details: True to size. XS=2, S=4, M=6-8, L=10, XL=12-14.
description: Wispy fraying flits across the neckline of a delicate satin cami effusing a soft, barely there luster.

name: Le High Rise V Neck Tee
description: We Made This Collection Of Fine Peruvian Pima Cotton T-Shirts To Perfectly Complement Our Signature Denim Fits. Each Tee Comes In Two Fits—A Longer Length For Mid-Rise Denim And A Cropped Length For High Rise.

name: Imaan x FRAME Front Cinched Sweater
description: Capture a laid-back California aesthetic in this ribbed V-neck sweater featuring an adjustable drawstring to cinch for your desired fit. Part of the Imaan Hammam x FRAME limited-edition capsule collection, we like it best with Le Slash Straight Jeans for an edgy take on off-duty style.

name: Exclusive - Forever Karlie Skinny--BLANC
description: The Perfect Jeans With An Extended Inseam For Longer Legs. Our Exclusive Collaboration With Supermodel Karlie Kloss Flatters With A Higher Rise, Longer Leg Proportions & A Skinny Silhouette. Crafted From Premium Denim In A White Wash Featuring An Overlock Hem, Allowing The Perfect Customized Hem.

name: Le Nik
description: A Low-Slung Jean Designed To Sit Straight On The Hips. Featuring A Toothpick Leg And 3" Double Cuff That Ends Right Above The Ankle, It's A Relaxed, Effortless Staple You Can Wear All Day Long. Le Nik Is A Relaxed Fit Intended To Be Worn Slightly Oversized, But If You Prefer A More Fitted Look, Consider Sizing Down.

name: Ruffle Turtle Neck
description: A cheerful ruffled neckline adds charm to this off-white ribbed sweater. Set in a slim silhouette that's perfect for tucking into denim and trousers, it's an instant staple.

name: Le Francoise Flare
description: We took our heritage Francoise jean and reinvented it for a retro-meets-modern aesthetic. This flared silhouette features re-engineered pockets and a wide waistband for a sexy, leg-lengthening fit.

name: Silk Clean Safari Shirt
description: A utilitarian take on our clean collared shirt, this off-white button-down features large flap pockets and voluminous sleeves. Layer yours under this season’s leather trench coat for a modern safari vibe.

name: Short Sleeve Clean Safari Shirt
description: A utilitarian take on our clean collared shirt, this white button-down features large flap pockets and voluminous sleeves. Layer yours under this season’s leather trench coat for a modern safari vibe.

name: Suede Les Second - Mini
description: Modern Style Meets Refined Luxury In Our Signature Les Second Mini. Crafted From Exquisite Suede, This Small Structured Bag Is Designed To Hold Just The Essentials (Wallet, Keys, A Few Extras) And Equipped With Double-Drop Handles Which Can Be Adjusted To Your Desired Length On The Polished Gold Pegs, A Cross-Body Strap, And A Discreetly Embossed Frame Logo.

name: Surf 70s Sweater
description: With clean lines and a fitted silhouette, this Summer knit features surfer stripes for a decidedly ‘70s twist. Try yours with cut-offs on laidback days. Or, mix them with utilitarian bottoms for a surfer-safari vibe.

name: Lace Pintuck Blouse
description: Delicate lace and pleat detailing give this classic blouse an update. For casual cool, wear yours with vintage-inspired jeans. Or, dress it up with leather pants and heels.

name: Petit Studded Belt
description: An edgy addition to your accessories collection, this slim leather belt features a square buckle in polished gold. With studded accents, it’s a cool finish to denim and pants and toughens up dresses and skirts.

name: Gathered Dress
description: A dressed-down take on the puff-sleeve trend, this T-shirt dress is the easiest way to make a statement. Wear yours with natural sandals and a woven bag on sunny days. After hours, simply swap for heels.

name: Le High Rise 70s Tee
description: We made this collection of fine Peruvian Pima cotton T-shirts to perfectly complement our signature denim fits. Each tee comes in two fits — a longer length for mid rise denim and a cropped length for high rise. This one features three-quarter sleeves and a high round neck.

name: Le Skinny de Jeanne Crop
description: A Cropped, Mid-Rise Skinny Jean That Sits Lower In The Front And Higher In The Back. Cut From Ultra-Soft, Super-Stretch Denim, This True-Blue Pair Features Slight Fade And Whisker Detailing With Gently Tattered Knees.

name: Le Crop Mini Boot Sanded Seam
description: A cropped bootcut jean with a modern feel, this faded-black pair is designed with a comfortable contour waistband that’s form-fitting at the top and tapers out from the knee. Style yours with everything from blouses to sweaters.

name: Le High Skinny
description: Classic 70s Inspired High-Rise Jean With A Contemporary Skinny Silhouette In A Grey Wash. Features Whiskering And A Slight Fade On The Thighs.

name: Button Neck Long Sleeve Tee
description: A long-sleeve striped tee cut in a flattering silhouette that fits in with a wardrobe of classic essentials. This staple styles well with everything from denim to skirts to trousers.

name: Grand Oval Buckle
description: This sleek belt is crafted from smooth suede for timeless style. Finished with polished gold ring, thread yours through belt loops or cinch your waist for a flattering shape.

name: Sustainable Le Skinny De Jeanne
description: An instant wardrobe essential, this classic mid-rise skinny jean features a clean and slim silhouette. In a deep indigo wash, this pair is made from sustainably sourced materials.

name: Imaan x FRAME Zip Up Hoodie
description: A modern take on cozy style, this graphic hoodie features zippered arms that convert to a short-sleeve silhouette. Part of the Imaan Hammam x FRAME limited-edition capsule collection, this style is complete with logo tape on the sweatshirt’s interior.

name: Coated Le Mini Skirt
description: Designed To Sit At The Hips, This Straight-Fit Denim Mini Skirt With Off-White Coating Is A Refreshing Take On The Wardrobe Essential.

name: Pointelle Petal Sweater
description: Made for a warm weather escape, this open weave sweater features a scalloped neckline that’s both classic and sweet. With jeans, the look is effortless. On holiday, we love it tossed over swimwear.

name: Imaan x FRAME Le Crop Coated Jacket
description: Featuring a cropped boxy fit, this coated denim jacket feels laid-back yet luxe. Part of the Imaan Hammam x FRAME limited-edition capsule collection, this style is complete with logo tape on the jacket’s interior.

name: Les Second - Mini
description: Modern style meets refined luxury in our signature Les Second Mini. Crafted from exquisite leather, this small structured bag is designed to hold just the essentials (wallet, keys, a few extras) and equipped with double-drop handles that can be adjusted to your desired length on the polished gold pegs, a cross-body strap, and discreetly embossed FRAME logo.

name: Le Skinny de Jeanne Raw Stagger--FILM NOIR
description: Our Classic Skinny in a Saturated Black Wash with Raw, Staggered Hems. Crafted from Premium Denim with Super Stretch and Strong Recovery.

name: Leather Trench
description: Sleek and sophisticated, this leather trench coat is a seasonal hero. Whether worn over a silk blouse, cozy knit, or easy tee, it’ll be your go-to piece for easy impact.

name: Le Mini Boot
description: A Boot-Cut Jean Designed With A Comfortable Contour Waistband That's Form-Fitting At The Top And Tapers Out From The Knee Into A Slight Kick.

name: Imaan x FRAME Darted Blazer
description: Master modern tailoring in this double-breasted blazer with darted seams for a flattering fit. Part of the Imaan Hammam x FRAME limited-edition capsule collection, this style makes a sleek statement when worn with the coordinating trousers.

name: Le High Flare
description: Putting a decidedly fresh spin on the ‘70s silhouette, this high rise jean is form-fitting through the hips and thighs with an easy flare from the knees. Highlight the waist-grazing silhouette with a feminine blouse or fitted knit tucked in.

name: Sustainable Le High Skinny
description: A classic high-rise skinny jean with a modern feel. Designed to sit at the small of the waist with a form-fitting shape, this pair is made from sustainably sourced materials.

name: Easy Scoop Tee
description: This wardrobe-essential T-shirt features a scooped neckline and short sleeves. Wear Yours with everything from jeans to suits and trousers.

name: Le High Straight
description: A Tailored Straight-Leg Jean, This High-Rise Pair Is Designed To Be Subtly Fitted With A Nip-In At The Knees. Cut From Premium Stretch Denim, This Medium-Blue Wash Is Versatile For Smart And Laid-Back Looks Alike.

name: Le Color--FILM NOIR
description: The Go-To Skinny Jean in a Saturated Black Color Wash. Crafted from Super Soft Premium Denim with Super Stretch and Strong Recovery.

name: Petit O Ring Belt
description: A Timeless Leather Belt Crafted From Smooth Cowhide. Minimally Finished With A Polished Gold Circular Buckle.

name: Boyfriend Blazer
description: Designed for warm weather, this lightweight blazer is defined by clean lines in organic white linen. With a tank top or cropped tee, the vibe is casually elegant. Or, go for a tailored look with the coordinating Metropolitan Pant.

name: Cropped Rib Tank
description: With a retro feel, this ribbed tank is a wardrobe staple. Featuring a round neckline and cropped fit, wear yours with everything from jeans to shorts and safari pants.

name: Variegated Long Sleeve Tee
description: Set a retro tone in this 70s-inspired ribbed tee. With long sleeves and a bateau neckline, wear yours with everything from denim to suede.

name: Mixed Rib Cardi
description: A modern essential, this ribbed V-neck cardigan works in every wardrobe. Whether worn as a top with jeans or styled over a slip dress, it’s timeless style at its best.

name: Silk Toile Mix Dress
description: Quintessentially Summer, this Hawaiian-print minidress is made for warm weather. With sharp lapels and pleat detailing, it’s as stylish with slides as it is heeled boots.

name: Le High Super Flare
description: This high-rise jean puts a decidedly fresh spin on the ‘70s silhouette. Form-fitting through the hips and thighs, this white pair kicks out into a dramatic flare from the knees for statement-making style.

name: Le Garcon Crop
description: A sophisticated boyfriend jean with a tailored straight-leg silhouette. Try yours with a smart top or blazer at the office. On casual days, try something oversized on top.

name: Cropped Velvet Perfect Trouser
description: A velvety cropped trouser crafted in a pale rose hue. The season's upgrade from your classic pant that maintains versatility. Wear with the matching blazer or on its own with shirts and knits.

name: Jersey Roll V-neck
description: A fresh take on the V-neck sweater, this jersey style is super soft to the touch. With roomy sleeves, scrunch yours up for a voluminous effect, or wear them long and layered under a jacket.

name: Contrast Stitch Bardot Crop Flare
description: Contrast Stitching Gives This Cropped Jean A Vintage Feel. Fitted Through The Waist And Thighs, Flaring Out From The Knees, And Ending Just Above The Ankle, This Pair Bodes Well For Any Wardrobe.

name: Sustainable Le Vintage Jacket
description: A wardrobe-essential denim jacket finished with brushed gold buttons and double flap pockets. With a vintage-inspired look, this style is made from sustainably sourced materials.

name: Heritage Original
description: From FRAME Heritage Denim, this vintage-inspired jean is a cult favorite. Featuring a high rise, this slender straight-leg fit cinches in at the waist for a curve-enhancing fit. A wear-on-repeat style for any wardrobe.

name: Contrast Trim Top
description: A Feminine White Blouse With 3/4 Sleeves And An Unexpected Contrast Trim Around The Ruffled Neckline, This Delicate Top Strikes The Ideal Balance Between Bold And Versatile.

name: Grand Oval Buckle Belt
description: A Sleek Addition To Your Accessories Collection, This Timeless Thick Leather Belt Crafted From Smooth Cowhide Is Finished With A Polished Gold Oval Buckle.

name: Safari Boiler Jumpsuit
description: Channel a surfer-safari vibe in this utilitarian-inspired jumpsuit. With cargo pockets and a belted waist to define your shape, it’s a statement-making all-in-one to finish with natural sandals or minimal heels.

name: Le Vintage Bermuda
description: A short version of our Le Original Skinny Jean, this Bermuda short features a high-rise waist for a curve-enhancing fit. Finished with raw hems, try yours with a T-shirt and blazer for retro-inspired style.

name: Easy Sweatshirt
description: From the Cloud Collection, this crewneck sweatshirt is cut from 100% organic Pima cotton. For a retro look, team yours with cozy joggers and tall tube socks.

name: Weekender Muscle Set
description: Part of our new Weekend Package of essentials you can live in Friday through Sunday, this set-of-three muscle tees is perfect for those who favor basics. Each tee is made from 100% Peruvian Pima Cotton and comes in recycled packaging.

name: Le Hollywood Crop
description: This ultra-high-rise cropped jean is designed for a fitted silhouette through the hips and seat with a straight leg. Highlight the waist-cinching fit by tucking in a bohemian blouse or fitted tee. Or, channel a utilitarian vibe by wearing a military-inspired jacket as a top and cinching with a belt.

name: Ali High Rise Skinny Sateen
description: A luxe take on our Ali high rise skinny jean, this ultra-soft pair is cut from lustrous sateen with a velvety feel. Ultra-fitted through the thighs, knees, and ankles for a leg-lengthening silhouette, try these with a velvet blazer for a tailored take on cocktail attire.

name: Rainbow Palm Sweatshirt
description: This graphic sweatshirt is a must-have for the warm season. Featuring a rounded neck, pair yours with everything from jeans to cut-offs.

name: Leather Bomber
description: Channel a luxe utilitarian vibe with this leather bomber jacket, complete with clean lines and flap pockets. For modern ease, style yours everything from jeans to slip dresses and trousers.

name: Silk Long Cuff PJ Blouse
description: This striped blouse is reimagined with exaggerated cuffs and a multi-directional stripe. Break the boudoir tone by pairing with rigid denim for a result that's both effortless and smart.

name: Le Skinny de Jeanne Crop
description: A Classic, Mid-Rise Skinny Jean With A Clean, Slim Silhouette. Cut From Premium Denim, This Light-Blue Wash Features Slight Fading And Whisker Detailing. Ending Just Above The Ankle.

name: Le High Flare
description: This High-Rise Flare Jean Puts A Decidedly Fresh Spin On The 70s Silhouette. Cut From Ultra-Soft, Super-Stretch Denim, This Pair Is Form-Fitting Through The Hips And Thighs, Kicking Out Into An Easy Flare From The Knees.

name: Ali Wide Crop
description: A high-rise jean that's slightly relaxed at the low hip and features a cropped slim wide leg. The perfect fit to wear in July with sandals or layered over boots into fall.

name: Le Crop Mini Boot Tuxedo Coated Shadow
description: A Cropped Boot-Cut Jean, This High-Rise Pair Is Designed With A Contour Waistband That Is Form-Fitting At The Top And Kicks From The Knee. Cut From Premium Stretch Denim, This Medium Blue Wash Features A Coated Tuxedo Stripe Down The Leg. Ending Above The Ankle.

name: Le Sylvie Slender Straight Raw
description: This leg-lengthening straight-leg jean is designed with a cleverly engineered high-rise fit to contour at the waist. Vintage-inspired with raw hems, style yours with a utilitarian top and natural sandals.

name: Silk Mandarin Popover
description: Go for effortless elegance in this romantic mandarin popover top. A relaxed fit with voluminous sleeves adds fluidity to the silhouette, the perfect blouse to wear with the season's latest denim.

name: Safari Pocket Long Sleeve
description: Set a utilitarian tone in this two-tone safari shirt with flap pockets and a sleek stand collar. On dressed-down days, pair yours with vintage-inspired jeans. For impactful moments, we love it with leather pants and heels.

name: Le Garcon
description: This mid-rise silhouette is a slouchier take on classic skinny jeans. With a slightly higher rise in the back, this pair is meant to be slung from the hips with a well-worn look that features cuffed hems.

name: Le Pixie High Flare
description: If you’re 5’3” and under, meet your new go-to pair of jeans. This high rise flare jean is designed for a slim fit through the hips, thighs, and knees, with a gentle kick that’s slightly roomier than a straight leg. Perfect for the office, style yours with tailored blazers and button-down shirts.

name: Long Sleeve Pima Cotton Tee
details: True to size. XS=2, S=4, M=6-8, L=10, XL=12-14.
description: Frequently worn staple tops should always be as soft as this pure pima cotton one.

name: Suede Le High Flare
description: Supple suede is a luxe update to our signature high rise flare. Form-fitting through the hips and thighs, highlight the waist-grazing silhouette with a feminine blouse tucked in.

name: Cali Silk Sleeveless Top
description: Cut From 100% Silk, This Summer-Essential Tank Top Easily Transitions From The Workweek To The Weekend. With A V-Shaped Neckline And Mandarin Collar, Layer Yours Over A Camisole At The Office And Style With Utility Trousers Or Cut-Off Shorts Off Duty.

name: Sunrise Ali High Rise Cigarette
description: Refreshed for the season, this cropped high rise skinny jean features unique half-moon stitch detailing on the front and back. Ultra fitted through the thighs, knees, and ankles for a leg-lengthening silhouette, this pair is made from sustainably sourced materials.

name: Le Sylvie Crop High Side Slit
description: Cut For A Relaxed Look, This High Rise Jean Features A Straight Fit Through The Hips And Thighs, With A Slightly Dropped Crotch That Tapers To The Ankle. Wear Yours With Everything From Shirts To Tees And Blouses.

name: Le High Skinny
description: A Classic High-Rise Skinny Jean With A Modern Feel. Designed To Sit At The Small Of The Waist With A Form-Fitting Shape, This Versatile Wash Is Cut From Premium Stretch Denim With Slight Fading And Whisker Detailing.

name: Le Baggy Jean
description: New for Summer 2020, this oversized style is meant to look like you’re wearing men’s jeans. Featuring an ultra-high-rise with small pleats under the front waistband, we love these with a feminine blouse, tailored shirt, or fitted tank on top to offset the slouchiness.

name: Easy Pleated Top
description: Pleated ruffle detailing puts a feminine spin on this classic white button-down. Featuring a high Victorian-inspired neckline, style yours with everything from denim to trousers and skirts.

name: Le Skinny de Jeanne Crop Raw Edge
description: An instant wardrobe essential, this cropped mid-rise skinny jean features a clean and slim silhouette. In a faded-blue wash, style yours with everything from blouses to tank tops.

name: Le Cropped Leather Mini Boot
description: In Our Best-Selling Cropped Mini Boot Silhouette, This White Leather Pant Is Designed For Warm Weather. Form-Fitting At The Top And Tapers Out From The Knee Into A Slight Kick, Style Yours With The Coordinating Trucker Jacket Or Pair Them Back To A Simple T-Shirt Or Tank.

name: Le Mid Rise 70s Tee
description: We made this collection of fine Peruvian Pima cotton T-shirts to perfectly complement our signature denim fits. Each tee comes in two fits — a longer length for mid rise denim and a cropped length for high rise. This one features three-quarter sleeves and a high round neck.

name: Denim Block Jacket
description: Update Your Outerwear With This Color-Block Jean Jacket. With A Noir Base And Thick Stripes In A Blue Denim Wash, The Resulting Aesthetic Is Creative Cool.

name: Ali Wide Leg Triple Waist Tie
description: Refreshed for the season, this relaxed wide leg jean features a triple waistband, self-tie belt, and oversized pockets. Designed for an easy fit through the waist, hips, and legs, this pair is made from sustainably sourced materials.

name: Silk Mix Stripe PJ Blouse
description: A classic button down blouse is modernized with bold, multi-directional stripes. For day, style yours nonchalantly with jeans and by night, pair with the coordinating pant for a boudoir-inspired evening look.

name: Ruffle Sleeve Silk Top
description: Elegant Silk Fabrication And Layered Ruffle Sleeves Take A Basic Button-Down Top To Chic Status. Pointed Collar, Curved Hem, Fluid Fit.

name: Silk Collared Peasant Blouse
description: An unexpected pairing, the peasant top silhouette and python print come together in this decidedly cool blouse for the season. Wear over kick-flare denim and ankle boots.

name: Le Mid Rise Scoop
description: We made this collection of fine Peruvian Pima cotton T-shirts to perfectly complement our signature denim fits. Each tee comes in two fits — a longer length for mid rise denim and a cropped length for high rise.

name: Double Faced Bell Coat
description: A versatile layer with enduring elegance. This wool and cashmere camel-colored coat featuring pockets and a removable belt is the ideal piece to toss over everything before heading out the door.

name: Le Cut Off Released Tux
description: A classic pair of denim cut-off shorts in a vintage-inspired wash with frayed hems. Wear yours on repeat with tees, tops, and sweaters.

name: Le Vintage Bermuda
description: This Vintage-Inspired Bermuda Short Features A High Rise That Cinches At The Waist For A Curve-Enhancing Fit. With Raw Hems And A Well-Worn Fade, This Silhouette Is A Short Version Of Our Le Original Skinny.

name: Velvet Shirred Keyhole Top
description: Festive and feminine, this velvet top features flattering gathered detailing through the bodice and sleeves. Enhanced with gently puffed shoulders, style yours casually with jeans or dial it up with sateen pants or leather culottes.

name: Ruffle Sleeve Silk Top
details: True to size. XS=2, S=4, M=6, L=8, XL=10.
description: Frilly tiers add twirly movement to this smooth silk blouse.

name: Slouchy U Tee
description: This Wardrobe-Essential T-Shirt Features A Wide U-Shaped Neckline And Cuffed Sleeves. Wear Yours Casually With Jeans, Trousers, And Skirts. Or, Style With Loungewear For Travel And Laidback Hangs.

name: Clean Collared Shirt
description: A Classic Button-Down Shirt Cut In A Relaxed Linen Blend For Easy-Chic Styling. With Extra-Wide Cuffs And A Modern Mandarin Collar, Wear Yours On Repeat With Denim, Linen, Or Loose Over Swimwear.

name: Le Bardot Crop Flare
description: A cropped jean with a vintage feel, this pair is fitted through the waist and thighs, flaring out from the knees and ending above the ankle. Style yours with everything from feminine blouses to tees.

name: Le Stevie Crop
description: With cropped tapered legs, this ultra high rise jean is meant to sit straight on the hips for a low-slung look. Style yours with wardrobe staples like sweaters and tees on easy days. Le Stevie is a relaxed fit intended to be worn slightly oversized, but if you prefer a more fitted look, consider sizing down.

name: Le Mini Boot
description: A bootcut jean designed with a comfortable contour waistband that’s form-fitting at the top and tapers out from the knee into a slight kick. Featuring a leg-lengthening and curve-enhancing fit, this pair can go from the office to off-duty.

name: Le Muscle Maxi Dress
description: The newest addition to our Tees For Your Jeans collection of 100% Peruvian Pima cotton T-shirts, this muscle maxi dress is a one-and-done take for relaxed days. Simply throw yours on and finish with a pair of leather sandals or espadrilles for elevated style.

name: Easy True Tee
description: This wardrobe-essential T-shirt features a scooped neckline and short sleeves. Wear Yours with everything from jeans to suits and trousers.

name: Le Grand Garcon Short
description: Featuring a Photo Real Collection print created from snapshots taken on a coastal California trip, this statement-making short is designed to hang on the hips for a slouchy fit.

name: Chunky Sweater
description: Puffed shoulders and balloon sleeves put a decidedly feminine spin on this ribbed sweater. Style yours effortlessly with jeans or military-inspired trousers for a fresh take on casual.

name: Block Le High Skinny
description: A Classic High-Rise Skinny Jean Designed To Sit At The Small Of The Waist With A Form-Fitting Shape, This Pair Is Cut From Premium Stretch Color-Block Denim Featuring A Blue Wash In The Front And Noir In The Back.

name: Le Tour Short Raw Edge
description: New for Spring, think of these cut-offs as your denim biker shorts. Featuring a high-rise fit with raw edges that hit at mid-thigh, dress yours up with a blazer and tee or go for relaxed-chic with an oversized sweatshirt or fitted tank.

name: Le Bardot Crop Flare
description: A cropped jean with a vintage feel, this pair is fitted through the waist and thighs, flaring out from the knees and ending just above the ankle. In cool weather, play up the retro look with a ribbed tee, suede jacket, and cool boots.

name: Clean Silk Blouse
description: A relaxed take on our clean collared shirt, this minimal blouse features a deep V-neckline and exaggerated cuffs. Wear yours elegantly with trousers and skirts or dressed down with cut-offs and jeans.

name: Tux Jumpsuit
description: Give your little black dress the night off in favor of the sleek tuxedo jumpsuit. Featuring cap sleeves and a flattering tie waist, style yours with strappy heels and bold jewelry for cocktails, dinners, and events.

name: Casual Linen Short
description: Master California ease in these belted shorts cut from breathable linen. Try yours with a lightweight blazer for a tailored look in warm weather. Or, tuck in a simple tank top on low-key days.

name: Service Shirt Jacket
description: Intricate chord detailing sets this military-inspired shirt jacket apart, with oversized pockets and shoulder epaulets to finish. A go-to layer with denim on the weekends, try dressing it up over a printed dress for work.

name: Ski Bunny Sweater
description: Whether you’re curling up après ski or channeling a winter getaway vibe, this crewneck sweater comes with a playful spirit. For easy-chic, pair it back to your favorite jeans or style with loungewear for cozy-cool.

name: Le Brigette Short Raw Edge
description: Updated for the season, this pair of high-rise shorts features a moody black wash with raw hems. For a la boheme vibe, style yours with everything from a ruffled top to a bohemian blouse or linen blazer.

name: Le High Straight
description: A Slim Fit Straight Leg Silhouette with a High-Rise Waist and a Subtle Nip at the Knee. Crafted from Premium White Denim with Super Stretch and Strong Recovery.

name: Le High Straight Raw Edge
description: Cut For A High Rise, This Classic Straight-Leg Jean Is Subtly Fitted Through The Mid-Thigh With A Nip-In At The Knees That Kicks Out Ever-So-Slightly At The Calf. Cut From Premium Comfort Stretch Denim With Raw Hems, Pair Yours Back To Simple T-Shirts, Tank Tops, Or Blouses.

name: Velvet Coatigan
description: Both tailored and relaxed, this velvet coat is elegant in place of standard outerwear. Featuring four front pockets and sleek buttons, layer yours over a slip dress for a luxe evening look or lean on it to dress up a T-shirt and jeans for day.

name: Le Mini Skirt Raw Edge
description: A wardrobe-essential denim miniskirt in the perfect vintage-inspired wash with raw edges. Style yours casually with a broken-in tee or this season’s must-have safari shirt.

name: Open Knit Stripe Dress
description: The ultimate Summer knit, this open-weave dress nails a California-in-the-seventies vibe. Effortless on its own with minimal sandals, try yours with a utilitarian jacket when you feel a chill. Ships with slip included.

name: Patchwork Sweatshirt
description: Patchwork detailing gives this crewneck sweatshirt a fashion forward feel. A casual-cool pairing with jeans and sneakers, consider styling yours with leather bottoms and heels, too.

name: Le Bardot Crop Flare Raw Edge
description: A Cropped Jean With A Vintage Feel, This Pair Is Fitted Through Waist And Thighs, Flaring Out From Knees And Ending Just Above Ankle. Cut From Premium Comfort Stretch Denim With A Rigid Look And Raw Hem, Style Yours With A Striped Ribbed Tee To Highlight The Contrast Top-Stitching.

name: Le Mix Sweater
description: Voluminous sleeves and uneven construction sets this sweater apart for a cooler take on cozy. Pair yours effortlessly with jeans and boots for everyday style.

name: Le Pixie Beau
description: New for Spring, this boyfriend-inspired jean is designed for ease and nonchalance, specifically for those 5’3” and under. Featuring a high-rise waist that’s meant to sit straight on the hips for a low-slung look, the fit is complete with relaxed legs that end in a double cuff. Le Beau is a relaxed fit intended to be worn slightly oversized, but if you prefer a more fitted look, consider sizing down.

name: Silk Animal Print Cami
description: A classic camisole updated in an alluring leopard print. For utilitarian-chic, wear yours with this season’s safari trousers or paperbag miniskirt.

name: Le Skinny De Jeanne Raw Edge Scoop
description: A Classic Mid-Rise Skinny Jean With A Slim Silhouette That Scoops Lower In The Front And Higher In The Back For A Flattering Fit. Cut From Premium Stretch Denim, This Pair Features Raw Hems That End Just Above The Ankle.

name: Nouveau Le Mix
description: Rigid Denim Cut In Le Original Silhouette, With A High Rise And Le Mix Styling. Constructed From Different Pieces Of Denim, Each Pair Is Unique With Varying Shades. Classic 5-Pocket Design, And A Released Step Hem.

name: Slouchy Rolled Tee
description: A wardrobe-essential muscle tee with a vintage feel, featuring rolled sleeves, a rounded necked, and tattered edges. The “Greetings from LA” message is a playful finish when paired with everything from denim to leather and loungewear.

name: Leather Trench--NOIR
description: A Double Breasted Trench Refined In Luxe Leather. Split Notch Lapel, Self-Tie Belt At Waist, Band Detail At Sleeve Ends, Back Kick Pleat. Lined.

name: Sustainable Cashmere Pointelle V Neck Sweater
description: Our Sustainable Cashmere V-Neck Sweater Is A Versatile Addition To Your Knitwear Collection. Toss Over A Silk Slip Dress For The Evening Or Front-Tucked Into Trousers For The Office.

name: Le High Super Flare
description: This high-rise jean puts a decidedly fresh spin on the 70s silhouette. Form-fitting through the hips and thighs, this dark-wash pair kicks out into a dramatic flare from the knees.

name: Le Skinny De Jeanne All Over Foil
description: A luxe take on our classic mid rise skinny jean, this shimmering pair makes an impact. Featuring a clean and slim silhouette, style yours with a feminine blouse for night out style.

name: Classic Velvet Blazer
description: An effortlessly cool blazer for autumn, this classic silhouette is punctuated by a pale rose hue that adds a hint of sweetness.

name: Le Skinny De Jeanne
description: An instant wardrobe essential, this classic mid-rise skinny jean features a clean and slim silhouette. In a faded-blue wash, style yours with a feminine blouse or safari shirt.

name: Easy Hoodie
description: Level up any off-duty look in this cozy hoodie from the Cloud Collection. Cut from 100% organic Pima cotton, it’s ultra-soft for lounging, travel, and beyond.

name: Le Crop Mini Boot
description: A cropped bootcut jean with a modern feel. Designed with a comfortable contour waistband that’s form-fitting at the top and tapers out from the knee into a slight kick, this light-blue pair is versatile with everything from blouses to tees and sweaters.

name: Velvet Party Top
description: Strike a chord in this velvet burnout top, featuring an alluring keyhole and strong shoulders. For low-key sleek, team yours with dark denim or up the ante with silky trousers, velvet pants, or leather.

name: Le Grand Garcon Short Raw Edge
description: Featuring a contour waistband, this gently tattered denim short is designed to hang on the hips for a modern, slouchy fit. Finished with raw edges that you can wear straight or cuffed, it pairs as perfectly with blouses and shirts as it does simple tanks and tees.

name: Plaid Cropped Perfect Trouser
description: Versatile And Sleek, These Classic Crop Trousers Are Designed In A Flattering Slim Fit. Wears Yours With Everything From Silk Blouses To Your Favorite Knits.

name: Le Bardot Crop Flare Exposed Buttons
description: A cropped jean with a vintage feel, this pair is fitted through the waist and thighs, flaring out from the knees and ending above the ankle. Style yours with everything from feminine blouses to tees.

name: Animal Print Sweatshirt
description: Modern cheetah print gives this crewneck sweatshirt an on-trend feel. Try yours with this season’s safari pants for fashion-forward style. Or, go low-key with vintage-inspired jeans.

name: True Feminine Sweater
description: Sweet flutter sleeves put a decidedly feminine spin on the striped sweater. Finely ribbed for a slim fit, tuck yours into high waisted jeans, skirts, and trousers for a flattering shape.

name: Cali Top
description: Blouson Sleeves Sweeten Up This Denim-Effect Blouse. Featuring A Deep V-Shaped Neckline And Mandarin Collar, Style Yours With Everything From Summer-White Denim To Linen Trousers And Shorts.

name: Le Francoise Cropped Mini Boot
description: We took our heritage Francoise jean and reinvented it for a retro-meets-modern aesthetic. This cropped flared silhouette features re-engineered pockets and a wide waistband for a sexy, leg-lengthening fit.

name: Silk Relaxed One Shoulder Top
description: With a draped silhouette and billowing sleeve, this one shoulder blouse is modern elegance to a T. Perfect for dinner, drinks, and events, it’s as stylish with jeans as it is leather pants, trousers, and skirts.

name: Le Original Raw Edge
description: A cult-favorite for vintage-inspired style, this slender straight-leg jean features a high-rise waist that cinches in for a curve-enhancing fit. Featuring tattered raw edges in a dusty grey wash, pair yours with a breezy white top and leather sandals for la boheme style.

name: Le High Skinny
description: A Classic High-Rise Skinny Jean With A Modern Feel. Designed To Sit At The Small Of The Waist With A Form-Fitting Shape, This Indigo-Blue Pair Is Cut From Premium Stretch Denim With Tattered Detailing At The Knees And Hems. Ending At The Ankle.

name: Le Garcon Crop Raw Edge Cuff
description: A slouchy cropped skinny jean with a mid rise that sits lower in the front and higher in the back, this pair is part of our sustainable denim collection. Cut for a straight, low-slung fit through the hips, we love these with a breezy white shirt or ruffled blouse for la boheme style.

name: Suede Les Second  - Mini
description: Modern Style Meets Refined Luxury In Our Signature Les Second Mini. Crafted From Exquisite Leather, This Small Structured Bag Is Designed To Hold Just The Essentials (Wallet, Keys, A Few Extras) And Equipped With Double-Drop Handles Which Can Be Adjusted To Your Desired Length On The Polished Gold Pegs, A Cross-Body Strap, And A Discreetly Embossed Frame Logo.

name: Velvet Panne Met Pant
description: Referencing '70s bohemia, velvet pants with an iridescent sheen feel both dressy and relaxed for evenings out. With a thick waistband and roomy wide legs, team yours with an oversized knit or go for head-to-toe tailoring with the matching blazer.

name: Le Brigette Short Triple Waistband
description: Refreshed for the season, this pair of high-rise shorts features a triple waistband, self-tie belt, and oversized pockets. For a California-in-the-seventies vibe, style yours with surfer stripes or a safari shirt.

name: Velvet Stand Soutache Jacket
description: Sumptuous velvet sharpens up via this sleek, military-inspired jacket. Featuring a stand collar, slim lapels, and intricate chord detailing, style it effortlessly with a T-shirt and jeans or try it with sateen pants for a luxe take on tailoring.

name: Le High Rise Muscle Tee
description: We Made This Collection Of Fine Peruvian Pima Cotton T-Shirts To Perfectly Complement Our Signature Denim Fits. Each Tee Comes In Two Fits—A Longer Length For Mid-Rise Denim And A Cropped Length For High Rise. Choose Le High Rise Muscle With High-Rise Jeans.

name: Metallic Keyhole Top
description: With a retro-chic feel, this alluring keyhole blouse is made for nights out. Featuring voluminous blouson sleeves and a paisley print stitched with metallic thread, team yours with velvet or leather pants for mega-impact or downplay the effect with a sleek pair of jeans.

name: Le Mini Skirt Front Split Release Hem
description: Intricate Distressed Details Give This Classic Denim Skirt Silhouette An Artful Update. Balance The Tattered Hems With A Timeless Button-Down Or Tee.

name: Le Palazzo Double Waistband
description: Cut for a roomy fit through the hips and thighs, this high-rise wide-leg jean features a double waistband for modern style. Failsafe with tanks and tees, try yours with a feminine blouse for dressier occasions.

name: Le Cropped Mini Boot Coated
description: A high-rise coated pant that fits straight throughout the knee and kicks into a small boot. Curve-enhancing and leg-lengthening, this is the ideal fit.

name: Le High Flare
description: This High-Rise Flare Jean Puts A Decidedly Fresh Spin On The 70s Silhouette. Cut From Ultra-Soft, Super-Stretch Denim, This Pair Is Form-Fitting Through The Hips And Thighs, Kicking Out Into An Easy Flare From The Knees.

name: Le Crop Mini High Waist Bootcut Jeans
description: A solid waistband trimmed in fringe contrasts with the bold cheetah spots on these stretch-denim jeans with a contoured high waist and cropped bootcut legs.

name: O Ring Belt
description: A sleek addition to your accessories collection, this timeless thick leather belt crafted from smooth cowhide is finished with a polished gold circular buckle.

name: Easy Sweatshirt
description: From the Cloud Collection, this crewneck sweatshirt is cut from 100% organic Pima cotton. For a retro look, team yours with cozy joggers and tall tube socks.

name: Open Knit Stripe Tank
description: The ultimate Summer knit, this open-weave tank nails a California-in-the-seventies vibe. Effortless with jeans, try a bolder combination by pairing yours with colorful denim or safari-style pants. Ships with cami included.

name: Silk Shirred Short Sleeve
description: This boldly feminine top features shirred sleeves and a mandarin collar. Enhanced with gently puffed shoulders, style yours casually with jeans or tucked into leather pants for a bigger statement.

name: Paperbag Trouser
description: Utilitarian Inspired, This Paperbag Trouser Channels A 70s Marrakesh Vibe. Cut From A Breathable Linen Blend With A Self-Tie Belt, Style Yours With A Ribbed T-Shirt Tucked In Or A Relaxed Blouse For Bohemian Ease.

name: Le Mid Rise Garcon
description: We made this collection of fine Peruvian Pima cotton T-shirts to perfectly complement our signature denim fits. Each tee comes in two fits — a longer length for mid rise denim and a cropped length for high rise. This one features long sleeves in classic white.

name: Fringe Woven Scarf
description: A Lightweight Scarf For Added Style In Warm Weather. In Classic Ivory With Frayed Edges, This Casual-Cool Design Is Essential At The Beach, On Holiday, And For Travel.

name: Le Beau Chino
description: This boyfriend-inspired fit is designed for ease and nonchalance. Featuring a high rise waist that’s meant to sit straight on the hips for a low-slung look, this chino pant is complete with relaxed legs that end in a double cuff. Le Beau is a relaxed fit intended to be worn slightly oversized, but if you prefer a more fitted look, consider sizing down.

name: Le Hollywood
description: This ultra-high-rise jean is designed for a fitted silhouette through the hips and seat with a straight leg. Highlight the waist-cinching fit by tucking in a feminine blouse or fitted tee.

name: Variegated Long Sleeve
description: Set a retro tone in this 70s-inspired ribbed tee. With long sleeves and a bateau neckline, wear yours with everything from denim to suede.

name: Le High Rise Scoop
description: We made this collection of fine Peruvian Pima cotton T-shirts to perfectly complement our signature denim fits. Each tee comes in two fits — a longer length for mid rise denim and a cropped length for high rise.

name: Tie Up Short
description: Channel a surfer-safari vibe in these belted sand-colored shorts. Try yours with the coordinating blazer for a tailored look or a simple tank top and sandals on low-key days.

name: Le Mini Boot
description: A mid rise bootcut jean designed with a comfortable contour waistband that’s form-fitting at the top and tapers out from the knee into a slight kick. Featuring a leg-lengthening and curve-enhancing fit, this pair can go from the office to off-duty.

name: Travel Pouch
description: Featuring "Life Necessities" in gold foil and the signature FRAME logo, this stylish travel pouch holds all the essentials when you are on-the-go.

name: Le Muscle Maxi Dress
description: The newest addition to our Tees For Your Jeans collection of 100% Peruvian Pima cotton T-shirts, this muscle maxi dress is a one-and-done take for relaxed days. Simply throw yours on and finish with a pair of leather sandals or espadrilles for elevated style.

name: Classic Knit Blazer
description: A relaxed take on tailored style, this knit blazer is a go-to for casual-chic. With slim lapels, double flap pockets, and a single button closure style yours over a thin sweater with jeans or as a sharp topper to a flowy dress.

name: Easy 70s Tee
description: From the Cloud Collection, this 70s-inspired crewneck T-shirt is cut from 100% organic Pima cotton. For throwback style, team yours with a flared pair of jeans.

name: Shirred Sleeve Silk Button Up
description: Shirred Sleeves Give This Classic Silk Button-Up Blouse A Decidedly Feminine Feel. With Concealed Buttons And ¾ Sleeves, Style Yours Loosely Over High-Rise Jeans Or Tuck Yours In For A Smarter Look.

name: Le Shirt Jacket Cargo Mix
description: This military-inspired denim shirt jacket is modernized with a cargo-mix design. Style yours simply jeans or embrace a surfer-safari look with belted shorts.

name: Exclusive - Forever Karlie Flare--FILM NOIR
description: The Perfect Jeans With An Extended Inseam for Longer Legs. Our Exclusive Collaboration with Supermodel Karlie Kloss Flatters with A Higher Rise, Longer Leg Proportions & A Flared Silhouette. Crafted from A Premium Dark Denim.

name: Le Crop Mini Boot Released Hem
description: A cropped boot-cut jean with a modern feel, this faded-blue pair is designed with a comfortable contour waistband that’s form-fitting at the top and tapers out from the knee. Featuring a released hem, style yours with everything from blouses to tees.

name: Metropolitan High Waist Wide Leg Pants
details: True to size.
description: Billowy, invert-pleated legs give a refined look to these breezy linen-blend pants fitted with a wide waistband.

name: Le Garcon Crop
description: A sophisticated boyfriend jean with a tailored straight-leg silhouette. For a California-in-the-seventies vibe, style yours with sun-kissed stripes or an eyelet blouse.

name: Le High Rise Muscle Tee
description: We Made This Collection Of Fine Peruvian Pima Cotton T-Shirts To Perfectly Complement Our Signature Denim Fits. Each Tee Comes In Two Fits—A Longer Length For Mid-Rise Denim And A Cropped Length For High Rise.

name: Ali High Rise Cigarette Coated
description: Our Ultra High-Rise Skinny Jean With A Shortened Inseam. Crafted From Super Stretch Premium Coated Denim, Wear This Pair With Everything From Button-Downs To Feminine Blouses Or Knits.

name: Lace Button Front Top
description: Puff Sleeves And Delicate Lace Detailing Give This Button-Front Blouse An Air Of Romance. Style With A Pair Of Vintage-Inspired Denim Or Wide-Leg Trousers For The Perfect Match. This Blouse Comes With A Cami Underneath For Added Comfort.

name: Leather Le High Flare
description: Our flare silhouette is reimagined in luxe leather with a hint of stretch and a black hue. Pair back to a button down and blazer for updated 9 to 5 style.

name: Petit Oval Buckle Belt
description: A luxe addition to your accessories collection, this slim leather belt features a small oval buckle in polished silver. With a metallic sheen, it’s a glamorous finish to denim, pants, and skirts.

name: Safari Wide Leg Trouser
description: With a flattering high rise, this wide-leg pair of trousers features cargo pockets and exposed buttons. Try yours with a military-inspired shirt for a surfer-safari vibe or go easy-chic with a broken-in tee.

name: FRAME x Tamara Mellon Slouch Knee Boot
description: This chic and minimal slouchy boot is a combination of FRAME’s laid back, California-cool aesthetic with Tamara Mellon’s time-honored luxury shoe design.

name: Les Second - Medium
description: Minimal, modern styling meets refined luxury in our Les Second Cabas Tote. Crafted from exquisite leather, this structured handbag is equipped with adjustable high-polish peg and buttonhole double-drop handles, a center welt seam, detachable pouch, and FRAME logo discreetly embossed at the top.

name: Jersey Roll Crew
description: A fresh take on the crew neck sweater, this jersey style is super soft to the touch. With roomy sleeves, scrunch yours up for a voluminous effect, or wear them long and layered under a jacket.

name: Silk PJ Set
description: A classic camisole updated in bold, multi-directional stripes. With the matching shorts, an eye mask, and silk pouch, it’s the perfect sleep set.

name: Vintage Shirred Tee
description: A dressed-down take on the puff-sleeve trend, this vintage-inspired tee is easiest way to dress up jeans or offset high-impact bottoms in leather and suede.

name: Silk Shirred V Neck Top
description: Puff shoulders give this blouse a subtle boldness that translates to day and night. Wear tucked into straight leg denim and polished off with loafers or knee-high boots.

name: Le Nik
description: A Low-Slung Jean Designed To Sit Straight On The Hips. Featuring A Toothpick Leg And 3" Double Cuff That Ends Right Above The Ankle, It's A Relaxed, Effortless Staple You Can Wear All Day Long. Le Nik Is A Relaxed Fit Intended To Be Worn Slightly Oversized, But If You Prefer A More Fitted Look, Consider Sizing Down.

name: Drop Shoulder Crew
description: This cropped sweatshirt is a modern take on cozy, featuring ribbed trims and drop shoulders. Perfect for layering on laidback days, don’t be afraid to style it unexpectedly with tailored pieces like a skirt of trousers.

name: Satin Lounge Tank
description: A Camisole Tank In Creamy Satin Is Cut On The Bias For A Body-Skimming Fit. V-Neckline Edged In Wispy Frayed Silk, Adjustable Straps, Darted Bust.

name: Le Bardot Crop Flare
description: A cropped jean with a vintage feel, this pair is fitted through the waist and thighs, flaring out from the knees and ending just above the ankle. In cool weather, play up the retro look with a ribbed tee, suede jacket, and cool boots.

name: Pleat Silk Sleeveless Top
description: With a ruffled neckline and sleeves, this feminine blouse equates to instant polish. Wear yours to the office with smart skirts or trousers and on the weekend, simply swap for denim.

name: Le Bardot Short
description: With a vintage feel, this pair of denim shorts is fitted through the waist and thighs. We like them best with this season’s oversized safari shirt or sun-kissed stripes on top.

name: Le Pixie Beau
description: New for Spring, this boyfriend-inspired jean is designed for ease and nonchalance, specifically for those 5’3” and under. Featuring a high-rise waist that’s meant to sit straight on the hips for a low-slung look, the fit is complete with relaxed legs that end in a double cuff. Le Beau is a relaxed fit intended to be worn slightly oversized, but if you prefer a more fitted look, consider sizing down.

name: Le Crop Mini Boot Cloud
description: Make a new-season statement in this aloe green pair of cropped bootcut jeans from the Cloud Collection. Designed with a comfortable contour waistband that’s form-fitting at the top and tapers out from the knee into a slight kick, this one of our best-selling fits with a modern feel.

name: Le Crop Mini Boot Raw Edge
description: A super stretch jean that fits straight through the knee and kicks into a small boot. Curve-enhancing and leg-lengthening, this denim features raw hems for a hint of laidback appeal.

name: Le High Ankle Straight Leg Jeans
description: Frayed hems and a faded finish play up the lived-in vibes of ankle-grazing high-waist jeans in comfortable stretch denim.

name: Suede 70s Shirt
description: A nostalgic silhouette with modern updates. This suede blouse features smart, subtle details like a sharply-pointed collar and contrast stitching. Wear with everything from flared denim to a leather skirt.

name: Le High Skinny Crop Raw Edge
description: A classic high rise skinny jean with a modern feel. Designed to sit at the small of the waist with a form-fitting shape, this cropped pair features raw hems and tattered detailing at the knee.

name: Le Skinny de Jeanne Crop Micro Shredded
description: A Cropped, Mid-Rise Skinny Jean That Sits Lower In The Front And Higher In The Back. Cut From Ultra-Soft, Super-Stretch Denim, This True-Blue Pair Features Slight Fade And Whisker Detailing With Shredded Hems.

name: Sustainable Le Palazzo
description: This high rise wide leg jean is made from sustainably sourced materials. With a roomy silhouette fitted through the hips and thighs—tuck in fitted tees, tanks, and blouses to balance the voluminous silhouette.

name: Le Mini Skirt Cargo Mix
description: A wardrobe-essential denim miniskirt, modernized with a cargo-mix design. Style yours simply with a crewneck sweater or broken-in tee.

name: 70s Turtleneck
description: A Minimal Ribbed Short-Sleeve Turtleneck That Works In Every Wardrobe. Wear Tucked Into A Midi Skirt And Ankle Boots For The Office Or As A Layer For Crisp Autumn Evenings.

name: Classic Silk Cami
description: A classic camisole updated in an alluring python pattern. For cool minimalism, wear yours with a pantsuit.

name: Le Pedal
description: With a high rise, this cropped jean is designed end just above the calves. For a modern take on retro, style yours with everything from eyelet tops to surfer stripes.

name: Le High Flare--COLUMBUS
description: 70s Inspired Mid-Weight Flare with Stretch Denim in a True Blue Wash with a Skinny Fit and Dramatic Flare.

name: Sustainable Cashmere Twist Front Sweater
description: Made from recycled cashmere, this twist-front sweater makes a statement. Featuring a rounded neckline and ribbed trims, style yours with a waist-high skirt for a polished look. Or, go casual-chic by pairing it back to denim.

name: Le Mid Rise V Neck Tee
description: We Made This Collection Of Fine Peruvian Pima Cotton T-Shirts To Perfectly Complement Our Signature Denim Fits. Each Tee Comes In Two Fits—A Longer Length For Mid-Rise Denim And A Cropped Length For High Rise. Choose Le Mid Rise V Neck With Mid-Rise Jeans.

name: Mini Skirt Mix
description: A classic denim mini skirt, updated with patchwork detailing. In cold weather, style yours with an oversized knit and tall boots. In the warmer months, it’s a cool finish to button-down shirts and tees.

name: Le Bardot Midi Skirt Raw Hem
description: A raw-hem denim midi skirt ending just above the ankle. This relaxed wardrobe essential features a front slit and patch front pockets.

name: Imaan x FRAME Cut Off Crop Tee
description: Capture a laid-back California aesthetic in this cropped T-shirt featuring a round neckline and darted seams. Part of the Imaan Hammam x FRAME limited-edition capsule collection, this style is complete with logo tape on the tee’s interior.

name: Cascade Dress
description: Clean And Minimal, This Cap-Sleeve Dress Is An Elegant Addition To Your Summer Assortment. With A Drop Waist And Slinky Feel, Style Yours Effortlessly With Barely-There Sandals Or Heels.

name: Denim Block Mini Skirt
description: A Classic Mini Skirt Featuring Color-Blocking In A Contrasting Noir. Team With Its Matching Jacket Or Wear Alone With Everything From Tees To Button-Down Shirts.

name: Exclusive - Forever Karlie Skinny--COLUMBIA ROAD
description: The Perfect Jeans With An Extended Inseam For Longer Legs. Our Exclusive Collaboration With Supermodel Karlie Kloss Flatters With A Higher Rise, Longer Leg Proportions & A Skinny Silhouette. Crafted From Premium Denim In A Blue Wash Featuring An Overlock Hem, Allowing The Perfect Customized Hem.

name: Le High Skinny
description: A classic high rise skinny jean with a modern feel. Designed to sit at the small of the waist with a form-fitting shape, this versatile wash is cut from premium stretch denim with slight fading and whisker detailing.

name: Faux Fur Lined Jacket
description: This classic denim jacket is lined with plush faux fur and matching collar for cold weather style. A fail-safe layer with pants, dresses, and skirts.

name: Scallop Button Down Shirt
description: Delicate eyelet fabric and scalloped trim give this button down blouse an air of romance. Style yours with a pair of cut-off shorts or vintage-inspired jeans on holiday.

name: Swing Sweater
description: A Modern Take On The Crewneck Sweater, This Balloon-Sleeve Silhouette Stands Out With A Wide Rounded Neckline And Loosely Knitted Weave. At Work, Style Yours With Linen Trousers And Sleek Loafers. Off Duty, Pair Yours Back To Vintage-Inspired Shorts Or Jeans.

name: Feminine Leather Military 70s Shirt
description: Cut from ultra-soft leather, this tailored shirt is made to stand out. Featuring double front pockets, brushed buttons, and voluminous sleeves, take it in a feminine direction by layering it over a slip skirt or dress. Or, tuck it into high-rise pants for a forward take on tailoring.

name: Le Skinny De Jeanne
description: Our classic skinny with a clean, slim silhouette gets an update with a tonal python pattern. Cut from premium stretch denim with strong recovery, these are an instant wardrobe favorite.

name: Le Mini Boot Exposed Buttons
description: A Boot-Cut Jean Designed With A Comfortable Contour Waistband That's Form-Fitting At The Top And Tapers Out From The Knee Into A Slight Kick. Cut From Premium Stretch Denim, This Leg-Lengthening And Curve-Enhancing Fit Also Features Exposed Button Hardware.

name: O Ring Patchwork Belt
description: A sleek addition to your accessories collection, this timeless thick leather belt crafted from smooth cowhide is finished with a patchwork python print and gold circular buckle.

name: Le High Skinny Side Button
description: A classic high-rise skinny jean with a modern feel. Designed to sit at the small of the waist with a form-fitting shape, this indigo pair features buttons at the hips and is gently faded for a vintage effect.

name: Pleated Ruffle Sleeveless Top
description: With A Ruffled Neckline, Ruffled Sleeves, And Pleated Detailing In The Chest, This Feminine Blouse Gives Instant Polish. Wear To The Office With Smart Slacks Or On The Weekend With A Slip Skirt And Heels.

name: Frame Shape Scarf
description: A Lightweight Logo Scarf With An Off-White Palette Set In Bold Stripes. Punctuate A Classic Button-Down Shirt Or Wear Around Your Shoulders On The Plane For Your Next Getaway.

name: Ali High Waist Cigarette Skinny Jeans
description: Ultra-high-rise skinnies are crafted from FRAME's super-stretchy premium denim that perfectly contours to your curves.

name: Jerry Striped Faux Fur Coat
details:
Slips on
Composition: 100% modacrylic
Dry clean
Imported


This style fits true to sizeWe suggest taking your normal size
Model measurements: height 5'9"/175cm - bust 32"/81.2cm - waist 24"/60.96cm - hip 34"/86.36cmShe is wearing size Small
description: FRAME adds its casual touch to this 'Jerry' faux-shearling jacket by detailing it with contrast horizontal stripes. Tailored to the shoulders, this piece is crafted with an elongated hem and open front for easy removal. Pair with sleek leather pants to complement its texture.

name: Silk Mixed Toile Hawaiian Shirt
description: Quintessentially Summer, this Hawaiian-print top is made for warm weather. With sharp lapels, chest pockets, and roomy sleeves, it’s as stylish with denim shorts as it is utility-inspired bottoms.

name: Le Flare De Francoise Belted Jumpsuit
description: A Modern Take On Utilitarian Style, This Cotton-Blend Jumpsuit Makes A Summer Statement. With Flared Legs And An Elasticized Waist That Cinches Your Shape, It’s A Fun And Flattering All-In-One To Pair With Everything From Sandals To Sneakers.

name: Petit Studded Oval Buckle Belt
description: A thin leather belt finished with polished gold studs and a minimal oval ring. Thread yours through belt loops or cinch your waist for a flattering shape.

name: 70s Shirt
details: True to size. XS=2, S=4, M=6, L=8, XL=10.
description: Subtly puffed sleeves enhance the easy drape of this cleanly tailored blouse.

name: Fair Isle Turtleneck
description: Seventies to a T, this Fair Isle sweater features a high neckline and an oversized fit. Wear yours over slim fit pants for the ultimate in cozy-chic style.

name: Le Beau Short Cuff
description: New for Spring, this boyfriend-inspired short is designed for ease and nonchalance. Featuring a high-rise waist that’s meant to sit straight on the hips for a low-slung fit, the look is complete with raw cuffs and tattered detailing.

name: Le Francoise Skinny
description: We took our heritage Francoise jean and reinvented it for a retro-meets-modern aesthetic. This skinny silhouette features re-engineered pockets and a wide waistband for a sexy, leg-lengthening fit.

name: Le Crop Mini Boot Raw Edge
description: A Super Stretch Jean That Fits Straight Through The Knee And Kicks Into A Small Boot. Curve-Enhancing And Leg-Lengthening, This Denim Features Raw Hems For A Hint Of Laidback Appeal.

name: Le Pixie Sylvie Slender Straight
description: If you’re 5’3” and under, meet your new go-to pair of jeans. A straighter take on our Ali High Rise Jean, this leg-lengthening silhouette is designed with a comfortable high rise contour waistband and meant to be super fitted through the thigh with a straight and narrow finish.

name: Imaan x FRAME Tie Up Button Up
description: At once retro and modern, this tie-front shirt features covered buttons and exaggerated cuffs. Part of the Imaan Hammam x FRAME limited-edition capsule collection, this style feels casually smart when worn with Le Twisted Baggy Shorts.

name: Paperbag Leather Short
description: The most luxurious way to bare a little leg, these paperbag leather shorts are impeccably cut. Downplay the luxe effect with a nubby knit or up the ante with a silk top.

name: Clean Safari Shirt
description: A utilitarian take on our clean collared shirt, this surfer stripe button-down features large flap pockets and voluminous sleeves. Layer yours under this season’s leather trench coat for a modern safari vibe.

name: Suede Patchwork Jacket
description: Two-tone patchwork gives this classic suede jacket a retro feel. With a sharp leather collar and pockets and a concealed zip, pair yours with the coordinating skirt for all-over impact.

name: Le Tour Short Raw Edge
description: Think of these cut-offs as the version of trendy biker shorts. Featuring a high-rise fit with raw and tattered edges that hit at mid-thigh, channel a la boheme mood by styling yours with a frilled blouse, breezy white shirt, or utilitarian jacket. For more of a tailored look, we love a linen jacket styled over an easy tank or tee.

name: Imaan Waist Bag
description: When the mood is sporty, this zippered waist-bag is a modern staple. Part of the Imaan Hammam x FRAME limited-edition capsule collection, this style is features a graphic belt and is complete with a discreetly embossed FRAME logo.

name: Shirred Bomber
description: A feminine take on a classic bomber, this shirred jacket is a stylish layer in warm weather. For laid-back chic, try yours with military-inspired bottoms and a simple tee.

name: Wrap Shirtdress
description: Elevated And Effortless, This Reworked Shirt Dress Features A Flattering Tie-Waist And Contrast Pocket And Sleeve Details That Take This Closet Staple Up A Notch. Finish With Sneakers Or Loafers.

name: Le High Skinny Raw Edge
description: A classic high rise skinny jean with a modern feel. Designed to sit at the small of the waist with a form fitting shape, this indigo pair features raw hems and slight fading.

name: True Feminine Sweater
description: Feminine Ruffle Sleeves With White Tipping Modernize This Classic Sweater. An Effortless Way To Elevate Jeans, Shorts, Or Linen Trousers.

name: Olivia Silk Top
details: True to size. XS=2, S=4, M=6, L=8, XL=10.
description: Subtly puffed sleeves bring a touch of sweetness to this drapey silk blouse.

name: Cali Top
details: True to size. XS=2, S=4, M=6, L=8, XL=10.
description: This eyelet top in a boxy silhouette with blousy lantern sleeves makes a breezy option for carefree, sunny days.

name: Les Second - Medium
description: Minimal, modern styling meets refined luxury in our Les Second Tote. Featuring a Photo Real Collection print created from snapshots taken on a coastal California trip, this structured handbag is equipped with adjustable high-polish pegs and buttonhole double-drop handles, a center welt seam, detachable pouch, and discreetly embossed FRAME logo.

name: Le High Skinny
description: Classic 70s Inspired High-Rise with a Contemporary Skinny Silhouette. Crafted from Premium White Denim with Super Stretch and Strong Recovery.

name: Single Breasted Blazer
description: Designed for warm weather, this single breasted blazer is defined by clean lines in a sandy hue. With a T-shirt and jeans, the vibe is casually elegant. Or, go for a tailored look with the coordinating shorts or trousers.

name: Silk Tucked Bib Blouse
description: Pintuck detailing gives this classic button-down blouse a formal feel. Featuring a collarless neckline, concealed buttons, and gently ballooned sleeves, it’s a sleek and modern essential to pair with jeans, pants, and skirts.

name: Drop Shoulder Crew
description: An Unexpected Cult Classic, This Striped Drop-Shoulder Crewneck Knit Takes Your Collection Of Basics Up A Notch. Pair With Everything From Wide-Leg Denim To Service-Inspired Pants.

name: Passport Wallet
description: Protect your passport with this double slit envelope pocket wallet, featuring the signature FRAME embossed logo and a "Let's Go" slogan.

name: Le High Flare Double Waistband
description: Putting a decidedly fresh spin on the ‘70s silhouette, this high-rise jean is form-fitting through the hips and thighs with an easy flare from the knees. Featuring a double waistband for modern style, highlight the waist-grazing silhouette with a feminine blouse or fitted tank.

name: Smocked Peasant Top
description: An elevated take on wanderlust, flowy silk fabric and billowing bishop sleeves give this white blouse a fresh feel. Offset the femininity with this season’s safari trousers and a trench. Ships with cami.

name: Le Original Skinny Mix Pocket
description: This vintage-inspired jean is fitted through the hips and thighs with a slim fit that continues down to the ankle. Perfect with tees and sweaters for casual style, consider dressing yours up with an elegant blazer for evening.

name: Belted Short Jumpsuit
description: Style Runs Small – Recommend Ordering One Size Up. A Modern Take On Utilitarian Style, This Cotton-Blend Jumpsuit Is At Once Tailored And Relaxed. With Short Sleeves, Front Flap Pockets, And A Self-Tie Belt, Style Yours Effortlessly With Sneakers Or Sandals.

name: Old School Sweatshirt
description: A wardrobe-essential sweatshirt with a vintage feel, featuring a rounded necked, raw hem, and tattered edges. The “Greetings from LA” message is a playful finish when paired with everything from denim to leather and loungewear.

name: Le Crop Leather Mini Boot
description: Our cropped bootcut silhouette is reimagined in luxe leather with a hint of stretch and a black hue. Pair back to a button down and blazer for updated 9 to 5 style.

name: Military Hoodie
description: This military-inspired hoodie is a modern take on cozy, featuring thick drawstrings, ribbed trims, and a slouchy fit. Perfect for layering on laidback days, don’t be afraid to style it unexpectedly with tailored pieces like a skirt of trousers.

name: Pintuck Linen Blend Bomber Jacket
details: True to size. XXS=0, XS=2, S=4, M=6-8, L=10, XL=12-14.
description: This linen-blend bomber jacket gets a feminine twist from pintucked pleats that cinch the waist and fashion a vintage-inspired silhouette.

name: Le High Straight Leather Tux
description: With a high rise, this tailored straight leg jean is designed to be subtly fitted with a nip-in at the knees. For a seasonal refresh, this pair is finished with leather and suede patchwork detailing.

name: Le Crop Mini Boot Side Button
description: A cropped bootcut jean with a modern feel. Designed with a comfortable contour waistband that’s form-fitting at the top and tapers out from the knee into a slight kick, this medium blue pair features buttons at the hips and is gently faded for a vintage effect.

name: Le Mini Skirt Split Front
description: A Straight Cut Mini Skirt Crafted From Premium Denim In Classic Bright White. Features A Split Front Frayed Hem.

name: PCH Leather Jacket
description: A new-season take on our iconic PCH leather jacket, this optic white hue is perfect in warmer weather. Crafted from premium leather that's designed for a lived-in look from the very first wear, style yours effortlessly with a T-shirt and jeans or drape it over your shoulders with night-out attire.

name: Imaan x FRAME Le Jagged Oversized Jacket
description: A fresh update to the classic denim jacket, this unisex style features an oversized fit with a frayed diagonal seam along the back. Part of the Imaan Hammam x FRAME limited-edition capsule collection, this style is complete with logo tape on the jacket’s interior.

name: Two Tone Jacquard Crew
description: This two-tone reversible sweatshirt feels fashion forward with a mock neckline and voluminous sleeves. Failsafe with jeans, consider styling yours unexpectedly with a slip skirt or layered over a dress.

name: Vintage Shirred Tee
description: A dressed-down take on the puff-sleeve trend, this vintage-inspired tee is the easiest way to dress up jeans or offset high-impact bottoms in leather and suede.

name: Le Sylvie Crop Released Hem
description: This cropped straight-leg jean is designed with a cleverly engineered high rise fit to contour at the waist. Featuring released hems, we love these with everything from safari-inspired jackets to feminine tops and tees.

name: Silk 70s Shirt
description: A nostalgic silhouette with modern updates, this hammered silk blouse features smart and subtle details like a sharply-pointed collar and gently billowed sleeves. An elegant match to denim and trousers alike.

name: Le Garcon
description: A Tailored Boyfriend Jean With A Mid-Rise Waist And Straight Legs That Taper Just Slightly Above The Ankle. In A Bright White Wash In Comfort Stretch Denim.

name: Le High Flare
description: Putting a decidedly fresh spin on the ‘70s silhouette, this high rise jean is form-fitting through the hips and thighs with an easy flare from the knees. Highlight the waist-grazing silhouette with a feminine blouse or fitted knit tucked in.

name: Imaan x FRAME Le Jagged Crop Jacket
description: A fresh update to the classic denim jacket, this cropped style features a frayed diagonal seam along the back. Part of the Imaan Hammam x FRAME limited-edition capsule collection, this style is complete with logo tape on the jacket’s interior.

name: Le High Skinny
description: Classic 70s Inspired High-Rise with a Contemporary Skinny Silhouette. Crafted from Premium Denim in a Dark Blue Wash. With Super Stretch and Strong Recovery.

name: Clean Safari Shirt
description: A utilitarian take on our clean collared shirt, this army green button-down features large flap pockets and voluminous sleeves. Layer yours under this season’s leather trench coat for a modern safari vibe.

name: Boyfriend Blazer
description: Defined by clean lines and a boxy boyfriend fit, this impeccably cut blazer is a modern must-have. We like it best with the sleeves pushed up and styled with everything from jeans to dresses.

name: 70s Scarf
description: This cheetah-print fringe scarf will liven up any outfit. Wear yours looped around your neck or draped over your shoulders to ward off chill.

name: Ski You Later Sweater
description: Whether you’re curling up après ski or channeling a winter getaway vibe, this crewneck sweater comes with a playful spirit. For easy-chic, pair it back to your favorite jeans or style with loungewear for cozy-cool.

name: Raw Hem Jacket
description: This Garment Takes A Special Dye Process. Each Individual Garment May Be Slightly Different In Color Which Is Unique To Each Piece. A Classic Denim Jacket Updated With Raw Hems And Unique Cloud Print. Featuring Double Flap Pockets And Darted Seams, Team This Flattering Style With Jeans For A Denim-On-Denim Look Or Layer Atop Dresses And Breezy Separates.

name: Tux Criss Cross Dress
description: A tailored take on the little black dress, this wrap silhouette defines easy elegance. With sleek lapels and ruched sleeves, it’s as impeccable with classic pumps as it is tall boots and sandals.

name: Laced Sweatshirt
description: Level up any athleisure look in this lace-up sweatshirt with voluminous sleeves. Try yours with this season’s safari pants or go low-key with vintage-inspired jeans.

name: Grand Oval Suede Braided Belt
description: This woven leather belt is finished with a polished oval ring for timeless style. Thread yours through belt loops or cinch your waist for a flattering shape.

name: Caitlin Cord Coverall
description: Utilitarian details add effortlessness to this one-and-done wardrobe staple. Crafted in a warm camel hue, these long-sleeve corduroy coveralls flatter in all the right spots while leaving room for a relaxed finish.

name: Gathered Crew
description: Gently Puffed Sleeves Modernize This Wardrobe-Essential T-Shirt. Endlessly Versatile, Wear Yours Casually With Jeans, Trousers, And Skirts Or Tuck Into It Trousers For A Laidback Take On Smart Style.

name: Travel Set
description: A treat for any traveler this holiday season, this cozy set is a fun gift, complete with a scarf, eye mask, and a pair of socks. Cannot be shipped internationally.

name: Le Sylvie Kick Boot
description: Style Runs Small – Recommend Ordering One Size Up. Cut For A Relaxed Look, This High-Rise, White Jean Features A Straight Fit Through The Hips And Thighs With A Slightly Dropped Crotch That Kicks Into A Boot-Cut Silhouette. Wear Yours With Everything From Shirts To Tees And Blouses.

name: Sustainable Le High Flare
description: This high rise jean puts a decidedly fresh spin on the 70s silhouette. Form-fitting through the hips and thighs with an easy flare from the knees, this pair is made from sustainably sourced materials.

name: Faux Mongolian Coat
description: Cozy and plush, this faux Mongolian coat makes a cold weather statement. Cut simply to keep the focus on the texture, it's the easiest way to dress up basics or add drama to an evening look.

name: Classic Sleeveless Silk Cravat
description: A Sophisticated Take On The Sleeveless Silhouette, This Boldly-Striped Blouse Is Designed With A Cravat For A Touch Of Elegance. Style With Closet Classics Like A Tailored Blazer And Leather Trousers.

name: Silk Sleeveless Cowl Top
description: A Striking Cowl Neck Accentuates This Fluid Sleeveless Top. With A Silhouette That Drapes Elegantly And Versatile Neutral Color Palette, It's The Perfect Way To Dress Up Classic Denim Or Trousers.

name: Le Vintage Bermuda Sanded Seam
description: A short version of our Le Original Skinny Jean, this Bermuda short features a high-rise waist for a curve-enhancing fit. Finished with raw hems, try yours with a T-shirt and blazer for retro-inspired style.

name: Le Garcon
description: A FRAME Classic, This Mid-Rise Jean Is A Slouchier Take On A Classic Skinny Jean. With A Slightly Higher Rise In The Back, This Pair Is Meant To Be Slung From The Hips And Features A Cuffed Hem.

name: Le Vintage Jacket
description: A Classic Denim Jacket Is Updated With A Slim Fit In An Optic White Wash. Finished With Brushed Hardware And Flap Pockets, Team This Vintage-Inspired Style With Dark-Wash Jeans For A Cool Contrast.

name: Le High Skinny Sateen
description: A luxe take on our classic high-rise skinny jean, this ultra-soft pair is cut from lustrous sateen with a velvety feel. Designed to sit at the small of the waist with a form-fitting shape, team these with a festive top and heels for evening or temper the effect with a cozy sweater.

name: Le Garcon
description: This mid-rise silhouette is a slouchier take on classic skinny jeans. With a slightly higher rise in the back, this pair is meant to be slung from the hips with a well-worn look that features cuffed hems.

name: Off Duty Tee
description: Part of our Cloud collection, this cropped white T-shirt is a modern wardrobe staple cut from ultra-soft organic Pima cotton. Featuring exaggerated cap sleeves and a twisted hem, wear yours on repeat with high-rise jeans and trousers. Or, for a chic reveal of skin, opt for this season’s Le Low Skinny.

name: Block Jacket
description: A Closet Staple Featuring Classic, Clean Lines, This Off-White Denim Jacket Features Contrast Color-Block Detailing Including A Noir Collar And Button Hardware.

name: Le Crop Mini Boot
description: A cropped bootcut Jean designed with a comfortable contour waistband that's form-fitting at the top and tapers out from the knee into a slight kick. Cut from premium stretch denim, this pair ends above the ankle and features a subtle grey plaid print.

name: Military Band Skinny
description: An Ultra High-Rise Jean Featuring A Wide 12" Waistband For Military-Inspired Impact. Featuring Front Buttons And Side Pocket Detailing, Wear These With A Relaxed Tee For A Cool Contrast.

name: Suede Patch Skirt
description: A luxe take on the Summer mini, this suede skirt is complete with cargo pockets and a polished zipper. For modern ease, style yours with a lightweight blouse or simple tank top tucked in.

name: Le High Super Flare
