Point of View
description: The ultimate 12-months-a-year, seven-days-a-week pants are tailored in J.Crew's soon-to-be-famous four-season stretch fabric.

name: Turtleneck sweater with side slits in supersoft yarn
description: The turtleneck sweater 2.0, thanks to a flattering fit with cool slits at the side and a magical mixture of merino wool, alpaca and stretch make this style supersoft (hence the name).

name: Stripe Crewneck Sweater
description: Brushed yarn is fuzzier and stretchier than mohair without any of the itchiness, making this oversized sweater a great pick to brighten up the middle of winter.

name: Jackie Cotton Blend Shell
description: As classic as they come, this piece works for layering or pairing with just about anything, and it belongs in every style icon's closet.

name: Long-sleeve everyday cashmere mockneck sweater
description: When it comes to quality and color, no one does cashmere quite like we do. Our best-selling and crazy-soft sweaters are the result of over 30 years of expertise, obsessing over fit, durability and handfeel. And all our vibrant, custom-developed hues come straight from our in-house color library. This season, we took the silhouette of our best-selling supersoft mockneck sweater and made it in our famous everyday cashmere. The curved hem hits low on the back, with thick ribbing detail for a luxurious finish. To honor the future of this fiber, we're proud to join the Sustainable Fibre Alliance (SFA), an international nonprofit working to create a more sustainable cashmere supply chain. As the first U.S. member of the SFA, we're supporting its efforts to ensure animal welfare, advocate for herding communities, restore grasslands and reduce cashmere's environmental footprint. Learn more about this special organization at sustainablefibre.org.

name: Curvy Demi Bootcut Jeans
description: In a fit designed to define the waist and accommodate an hourglass shape, these high-waisted jeans are made from the brand's never see-through white denim.

name: Puff Sleeve Ponte Top
notes: Material - Viscose and Nylon.  Nylon is missing from selection.

name: Scoopneck ribbed henley T-shirt in stripe
description: The ultimate tee for tucking into high-rise denim or pants with a flattering slim fit, henley neckline and throwback-style half sleeves. Plus, a touch of stretch for a super-flattering finish.

name: Leopard Boyfriend Crewneck Sweater
description: A double-knit construction means the supercute leopard pattern is knit right into this cotton-and-wool-blend sweater.

name: Parke Stretch Linen Blend Blazer
details: True to size.
description: Your new favorite layer for spring, this blazer features a cool fit and a stretch-linen blend that's easy to move in.

name: Leopard Cashmere Crewneck Sweater
description: This season, J.Crew put a wildly wearable spin on their classic cashmere crew, in leopard print.

name: Point Sur silk tunic in block print
description: Point Sur specializes in vintage-inspired jeans with modern details—it's the kind of cool that never goes out of style. Like this pretty silk tunic, for example. We crafted it in a block print pattern we designed in-house, and added elegant details like exaggerated cuffs and covered buttons, as well as a high-low hem that's perfect for front-tucks. We recommend pairing it with white denim for summer nights out.

name: Sophia kitten heels in Italian leather
description: Meet Sophia, our super modern take on the classic kitten heel. High points: sleek, sculptural Italian leather and a chic pointy toe.

name: Tissue Turtleneck
description: Back by popular demand: J.Crew's classic, supersoft, perfect-for-layering tissue turtleneck.

name: Crewneck Cashmere Sweater
description: This cashmere sweater feels crazy soft, without being crazy expensive—and we wouldn't be surprised if you want to reach for it every day.

name: Crewneck Cashmere Sweater
description: This cashmere sweater feels crazy soft, without being crazy expensive—and we wouldn't be surprised if you want to reach for it every day.

name: Puff Sleeve Woven Lace Top
description: With a floaty, all-cotton body, woven lace details on the bib and sleeve, and a keyhole opening in the back, this ultra-wearable shirt has a lot going for it.

name: Bedford sandals with bow in metallic leather
description: The molded footbed means increased comfort and arch support for walkability. The pretty bow means increased cuteness and outfit support.

name: Square-neck long-sleeve top in brushstroke floral 365 crepe
description: Crafted in a versatile desk-to-dinner drapey fabric, this top has a flattering square neckline and elastic bracelet sleeves so you can push them up when you need to get down to business. Plus, we loved this 365 crepe brushstroke floral fabric so much, we created a skirt and pants to match.

name: Penny ankle-strap sandals in gingham
description: Retro and totally walkable, thanks to the block heel. Now in mood-brightening yellow gingham.

name: Camo Flowers Long Sleeve Button-Up Shirt
description: Pajama-style piping and a front patch pocket detail this groovy button-up shirt in a camo-inspired floral print.

name: Boyfriend Cardigan
description: Knit from a brushed yarn blend that features alpaca and merino wool, this roomy cardigan is stretch-kissed, itch-free and ideal for chilly planes and offices.

name: Peekaboo Stripe Pleated Midi Skirt
details: True to size.
description: This pretty pleated skirt features contrasting peekaboo stripes that emphasize the swishy nature of the silhouette.

name: Sleeveless tank in Liberty® Josephine floral
description: With a cute keyhole back and a flattering shoulder-accentuating cut, this top is the perfect complement to dress-down jeans or dress-up, well, whatever you dress up with. Bonus: The print comes from Liberty London (the British print house that's been known for its mood-lifting florals since 1875).

name: Sadie boots in snake-embossed leather
description: Meet your new favorite everyday ankle boot—now in a charming snake print that goes great with dresses, cropped denim and the ever-so-satisfying crunch of stepping on fallen leaves.

name: High Rise Toothpick Jeans
description: To solidify their "best ever" status, these superskinny ankle jeans feature the brand's Perfecting Pockets™ which are designed to lift you up and hold you in.

name: HATCH X J.Crew trench-cape
description: We teamed up with HATCH, the NYC-based brand for mamas-to-be, on a streamlined capsule collection—for work, weekends, wherever—made to fit you (and your bump) through every stage. Crafted in water-resistant cotton, this easy layer features classic trench details (like horn buttons and roomy pockets) on a swingy silhouette. The best part? It looks equally pulled together when worn open—to show off the pretty pink piping on the inside—or closed.

name: Boatneck Painter T-Shirt
description: As classic as it gets, this new version of a boatneck top that's a beloved brand icon has been rebooted with sturdier (but still just as soft) cotton.

name: Regent 4-Season Stretch Blazer
details: True to size.
description: Instantly pulling together any outfit, a fitted blazer with clean lines, a popped collar and a slightly longer length doubles as a jacket on chilly mornings.

name: J.Crew Essential T-shirt
description: Specially washed for softness, our lightweight Essential T-shirt feels like an old favorite from the very first wear (aka you'll never want to take it off).

name: Supercozy balloon sleeve mockneck top in TENCEL™ lyocell
description: This easy turtleneck pullover with pretty puff sleeves is made of supersoft TENCEL™ lyocell, a fiber that's produced from wood pulp sourced from sustainably managed and certified forests (meaning not ancient or endangered!) then put through a closed-loop production process that recycles water and solvents. The result is a soft, stretchy fabric—somewhere between a heavy tee and a light sweater—that's naturally soft and breathable.

name: Classic Fit Botanical Bee Silk Boy Shirt
details: True to size.
description: This easy button-up silk blouse gets a fun upgrade thanks to a naturally sweet print featuring bees and botanicals.

name: Stella heels in Ratti® falling leaves
description: Our Stella pumps are Italian-made with a chunky heel and just-right (read: walkable) height. Consider this strappier version in a summer-friendly print from Italy's Ratti print house (home to some of the world's most amazing motifs since 1945).

name: Colorful Gingham Front Flap Pocket Skirt
details: True to size.
description: This skirt is reminiscent of the styles worn by '60s schoolgirls and '90s prepsters.

name: High Rise Button Fly Denim Shorts
description: With a flattering high waist and cool button fly, these comfy denim shorts are the ones you're going to be wearing a lot.

name: Sundry™ "Je Ne Sais Quoi" T-shirt
description: Southern California meets the South of France in this laid-back collection by Matthieu Leblan, a French designer who was inspired by the surf culture of Venice Beach. Each one of his pieces is made in the USA from the softest of fabrics, with a focus on quality and color—like this soft T-shirt embroidered with the words "Je Ne Sais Quoi."

name: No. 2 Pencil® skirt in overize houndstooth
description: You asked, we answered... Our original No. 2 Pencil skirt is back! The classic style sits at the waist, with that same famously flattering knee-length you know and love (talk about looking sharp). It's crafted in a special, textured tweed that's surprisingly soft and not too heavy, so you can wear it now and all through fall. (P.S. We also made a matching lady jacket.)

name: Hudson Drapey Velvet Top
description: Lustrous velvet, draped detailing and a fits-like-a-glove cinched waist make this camisole an RSVP-ready piece for every event on your calendar.

name: Scattered Daisies 4-Inch Stretch Chino Shorts
details: True to size. High rise.
description: Closet newsflash: J.Crew's classic chino shorts just got better by adding a hint of stretch—which means they're comfortable and easier than ever to move in.

name: Toothpick Jeans
description: J.Crew's skinniest jean cut, the toothpick, is lean, cropped and a little bit sexy (i.e., the jean you're most likely to tear your closet apart looking for).

name: Camille Shawl Collar Sweater Blazer
description: The sweater-blazer—J.Crew's customer-favorite layering invention—is the thing to wear when a jacket is too much, but a sweater is not enough.

name: Balloon sleeve cable knit cardigan
description: Leather buttons and a standing collar add even more charm to this cozy balloon sleeve cardigan. Details we love: the classic cable knit design and ribbed hems.

name: Margot cropped sweater-blazer
description: A slim-ly tailored knit blazer with a front-button closure that toes the line between cardigan and jacket—making it completely perfect.

name: Boyfriend utility shirt
description: A mens-y military-inspired button up that our designers tailored just for the ladies, thanks to a slimmer fit that's super-flattering.

name: Reno Metallic Jacquard Chiffon Top
description: This high-shine style—with a swingy silhouette, shimmery gold floral and chic high neck—will look at home everywhere from holiday dinners to fancy-ish fetes.

name: Classic-fit boy shirt in crinkle gingham
description: In terms of hands-down closet essentials, our relaxed boy shirt ranks up there with blue jeans, chinos and little black dresses. Featuring a boyfriend-inspired fit that's tailored especially for you, this one sports one of our favorite prints: gingham! For more ways to wear it, watch our Style Hacks video now.

name: New High/Low Waffle Sweater
description: A magical mixture of wool, alpaca and stretch make this sweater super soft, and you'll love the flattering rounded hem and plush waffle-knit texture.

name: Chunky Alpaca Turtleneck
description: This chunky knit in a soft alpaca-kissed blend is an ideal cold-weather sweater.

name: Collection cropped moto jacket in crackled leather
description: This genuine lamb leather jacket in a classic biker silhouette (with a slightly cropped, feminine fit) will add edgy polish to all your fall outfits—no motorcycle required. We especially love it over a swingy floral dress or paired with your favorite pair of jeans.

name: Sleepy Lions Silk Twill Button-Up Shirt
details: True to size.
description: A pajama-inspired silk shirt features a pride of sleepy lions wandering from collar to cuffs.

name: Slim perfect T-shirt in stripe
description: The perfect-fit T-shirt you love, now with longer sleeves so it's even more, well, perfect. See our T-shirts in action.

name: Reverse Print Tencel® Lyocell Sweater Tee
description: Think of this as the perfect warm-weather sweater—or like an extra-special T-shirt.

name: Collection floral silk jacquard top
description: An extra-special top in a silk jacquard (meaning the flowers are woven straight into the fabric)—we love the dramatic ruffle details down the sleeve, delicate fabric buttons and polished cuffs. Tuck this one into your favorite wear-to-work trousers or pair with black jeans for a night out.

name: Banner Day X J.Crew "Banner Day" crewneck T-shirt
description: Ojai, California-based husband-and-wife team Kate Ciepluch and Grahm Sisson first got the idea for Banner Day after Grahm's mom passed down a well-loved tee from the '80s she no longer wore. The two, who both had worked in the fashion industry for decades, launched the plan for Banner Day as a way to bring the vibe of that vintage T-shirt to you. In comfy, soft cotton with original embroidered artwork, an heirloom-quality is a hallmark of their line.

name: Point Sur wide-leg full-length pant
description: Point Sur is inspired by our original collection of LA-made denim and it's the kind of cool that never goes out of style. These wide leg pants, for instance, are a by-popular-demand update to our bestselling wide leg crop. With a full length silhouette, they have the same wide leg that's not too wide, but with a longer inseam for a seasonless touch.

name: Gingham Pull-On Shorts
details: True to size. XXS=00, XS=0-2, S=4-6, M=8-10, L=12-14, XL=16. High rise.
description: With a swishy pull-on silhouette and a cute gingham pattern, this is the pair you'll find yourself reaching for every day this summer.

name: Pull-on toothpick jean in black
description: Everything you love about our jean, now with an easy pull-on waistband.

name: Teddy sherpa topcoat
description: Let it be known, once you're wrapped up in our famously plush teddy sherpa, you may never want to take it off. Our coziest topcoat comes in a chilled-out array of colors and features a notch collar, easy snap closure and of course, pockets. Bonus: It's machine washable!

name: Tweed pencil skirt with fringe
description: We partnered with a fabric house in the Southwest of France to make the custom trim at the hem of this polished tweed pencil skirt. Even better: We also designed a matching jacket for more outfit potential.

name: Scoopneck ribbed henley T-shirt
description: The ultimate tee for tucking into high-rise denim or pants with a flattering slim fit, henley neckline and throwback-style half sleeves. Plus, a touch of stretch for a super-flattering finish.

name: Painter's Leopard Cotton Terry Sweatshirt
description: Speckled with painterly leopard spots, this cozy sweatshirt makes your casual outfit look like a work of art.

name: Bow Back Sweatshirt
description: Not only does this pullover feature cute details (like the satin ribbon and back keyhole), but it's so soft, you have to feel it to believe it.

name: Parke Blazer
details: True to size.

name: Spaghetti-strap ruffle dress in Liberty® Favourite Flowers
description: This pretty dress with a ruffle-hem and back smocking is the ultimate feminine pick for everything "dressy-ish" this spring and summer. Plus, it's made in a vintage pattern from Liberty London, the British print house that's been known for its mood-lifting florals since 1875.

name: Margot Crewneck Re-Imagined Wool Sweater
description: A slightly relaxed sweater with the ease of your favorite T-shirt is knit from pure merino wool that's—wait for it—machine washable.

name: Nautical Embroidery Short Sleeve T-Shirt
description: J.Crew took to the seas for inspiration on lots of their knits this season, and this nautical tee with embroidered details is no exception.

name: V-Neck Boyfriend Cashmere Sweater
description: This cashmere sweater feels crazy soft without being crazy expensive—and we wouldn't be surprised if you want to reach for it every day.

name: Jacquard Stripe Scoop Neck Midi Dress
details: True to size.
description: This classic scoop-neck silhouette gets a fun update thanks to an understated stripe pattern.

name: Puff-sleeve top
description: One of our favorite silhouettes of the season, with feminine puff sleeves and box pleat in back for an easy, flattering fit. We love it tucked in to high-waisted denim.

name: No. 2 Pencil® skirt in four-season stretch
description: You asked, we answered... Our original No. 2 pencil skirt silhouette now comes in four-season stretch (made famous by our best-selling Cameron pant), meaning it can be worn spring, summer, fall and winter. It's an instant wardrobe go-to. Pair it with our Regent Blazer in four-season stretch for what we call a "hookup."

name: Stretch piqué sheath dress with fluted hem
description: We took a structured piqué fabric—it's got a slightly weightier quality that makes it superflattering—and added an even more flattering stretch to it, so this sleek sheath dress (with a pretty fluted hem) fits well and looks great.

name: HATCH X J.Crew balloon-sleeve sweater-dress
description: We teamed up with HATCH, the NYC-based brand for mamas-to-be, on a streamlined capsule collection—for work, weekends, wherever—made to fit you (and your bump) through every stage. In supersoft merino wool, this easy midi-length dress is for those days when you want to look polished, but really don't feel like doing the whole waistband thing...

name: Gingham button-front midi dress with ruffle hem in soft rayon
description: The one thing that every closet needs: a classic soft rayon sundress with pretty tie straps, a true button-front and pockets (!). But this summery style has so much more, like a fun gingham print, a ruffle hem and a pretty tea length.

name: Vintage Cotton Tank
description: A customer-favorite cotton tank is back and better than ever.

name: Chateau Stadium Cloth Parka
details: True to size.
description: Make winter your coolest season—and no, we're not talking about the forecast.

name: Popover in striped crinkle cotton
description: This breezy popover is perfect for throwing over bathing suits or tucking into high-waisted denim shorts. Plus, it's crafted in our most travel-friendly fabric yet, a highly breathable, slightly sheer crinkle cotton that comes stylishly pre-wrinkled so you'll never have to wonder if there's an iron where you're going again.

name: Cropped T-shirt in slub cotton
description: This cool, cropped tee is exactly what your high-rise jeans are looking for. Plus, it's crafted in an environmentally friendly fabric that incorporates 43% recycled poly—two plastic bottles are recycled for each tee!

name: High Waist Camo Jacquard Tapered Cargo Pants
description: Tapered-leg cargos with a totally relaxed vibe are cut from camo jacquard for the perfect high-low style mix.

name: Toothpick High Rise Jeans
description: These high-waist skinnies are probably the perfect black jeans thanks to a wash that stays clean and dark even after multiple laundry cycles.

name: Slim Stretch Perfect Shirt
details: True to size.
description: The perfect shirt for work and beyond.

name: Cropped long-sleeve top in 365 crepe
description: A polished and modern top that pairs perfectly with pencil skirts and high-waisted anything else. In our new wrinkle-resistant crepe fabric, it has a texture making it ideal for travel or wearing repeatedly, which we suspect you will. Pro tip: Pair with any of our pants or pencil skirts in 365 crepe and you've got a modern spin on a suit.

name: Garment Washed Crewneck Sweater
description: Look a little closer: this ribbed sweater has details on details due to a special fading process.

name: Women's 2011 Icon trench
description: We took our signature trench coat and made a few tweaks—a higher waist, shorter hem, and navy underfelt collar meant for popping—to bring it into 2018 (and beyond!). But don't worry, the classic details you already love are still there.

name: Short eyelet tunic in organic cotton
description: Intricate eyelet detail on the sleeves and an embroidered neckline take this breezy coverup way beyond basic. Feel-good fact: Organic cotton is grown without toxic chemicals or GMOs (genetically modified organisms), which means it's better for the health of the soil, the ecosystem and the people who farm it.

name: Crystal floral stud earrings
description: These unique, lightweight earrings are a fresh finishing touch to any outfit. For added flower power, pair them with one of spring's superpretty floral prints. Bonus: We made a matching necklace too, so don't miss it!

name: Ruffle classic popover shirt in Liberty® Favourite Flowers
description: Made from lightweight cotton and a print from Liberty London (the British print house that's been known for its mood-lifting florals since 1875), this classic popover is a perfect match for skirts, jeans and leggings.

name: Camo Cashmere Crewneck Sweater
description: When it comes to quality and color, no one does cashmere quite like J.Crew.

name: Devon camera bag in croc-embossed leather
description: Our favorite way to go hands-free? This cool camera bag from our Devon collection, with a simple silhouette featuring custom hardware and of-the-moment croc-embossed leather. With an external pocket and internal card slot, it's about to become that carry-everywhere bag you've longed for.

name: Metallic Leaf Jacquard Pencil Skirt
details: True to size.
description: Go for the gold, from conference calls to holiday dinner parties, in this striking pencil skirt crafted from textural metallic leaf jacquard.

name: Toothpick Jeans
description: Lean, cropped and a little bit flirty—these lightly faded jeans feature a flattering fit thanks to the brand's new Perfecting Pockets™.

name: Curvy slim stretch perfect shirt in stripe
description: You asked for a curvier fit in our signature slim perfect shirt, and we worked hard to nail it. We updated this perfectly tailored button-up with darting on the front to accommodate bigger busts and a generous stretch to fit your form in all the right places.

name: Rolled Scoop Neck Sweater
description: This simple scoop-neck sweater makes you feel like you're on a sailboat in the North Atlantic, or maybe just at work, or the movies—do you catch our drift?

name: Tall asymmetrical pencil skirt in everyday wool
description: Our new favorite pencil skirt is made from stretch wool, a fabric that's as flattering as it is polished—not to mention seasonless thanks to its midweight. This asymmetrical and artful pencil skirt is exactly what your work-to-wherever wardrobe is missing. Pro tip: Pair with any of our blazers in everyday wool and you've got a modern spin on a suit.

name: Tank top in Re-Imagined Silk
description: We recast our customer-favorite scoopneck tank in Re-Imagined Silk (you loved this style in velvet last holiday). What's Re-Imagined Silk? It's bluesign® approved and crafted at PFGH™, a LEED®-certified facility whose manufacturing process uses less water and energy—and it's dyed without hazardous chemicals.

name: Button-detail chunky knit pullover sweater
description: The chunky knit and marled hues of this boatneck sweater make it a cold-weather go-to. Bonus: The slightly relaxed fit means it'll drape perfectly when you tuck the front into high-waisted pants and jeans.

name: Tiered top in merino wool
description: Finished with flirty shoulder ties, this tiered ruffle top makes every pair of shorts and pants in your closet better.

name: Smocked ruffle mini skirt in textured stripe
description: We never met a stripe we didn't like...especially vacation stripes like this laidback mini skirt with a comfortable smocked waist and ruffled hem.

name: Everyday Chambray Shirt
details: Runs small; order one size up
description: The shirt you're likely to be reaching for 365 days a year is cut for the perfect not-too-tight, not-too-loose fit in cotton chambray.

name: Ribbed scarf in everyday cashmere
description: When it comes to quality and color, no one does cashmere quite like we do. And while winters can be rough, this cozy ribbed scarf is very, very soft. To honor the future of this fiber, we're proud to join the Sustainable Fibre Alliance (SFA), an international nonprofit working to create a more sustainable cashmere supply chain. As the first U.S. member, we're supporting its efforts to ensure animal welfare, advocate for herding communities, restore grasslands and reduce cashmere's environmental footprint. Learn more at sustainablefibre.org.

name: Hayden Kickout Crop Pants
details: True to size. High rise.
description: These favorite pants in a bi-stretch cotton blend (so they're easy to move in) feature a flattering wide waistband and 'Perfecting Pockets' that hold you in.

name: Stripe Crinkle Pullover
description: This breezy popover in a breathable, slightly sheer fabric comes stylishly pre-wrinkled so you'll never have to think about irons on vacation again.

name: Leopard Pleated 365 Crepe Shorts
details: True to size. High rise.
description: This flowy, high-waist silhouette combines the style of a pleated skirt with the coverage of shorts, plus fun leopard spots.

name: Stella heels with ankle strap in leather
description: Your favorite Stella heel, simplified (but still made in Italy with details that still stand out). These strappy sandals have a chunky (read: walkable) heel—so yes, you can wear them to work and drinks after.

name: Paperbag Waist Shorts
details: True to size. High rise.
description: Cute shorts are made with a paperbag waist and pretty sash, and patterned in a retro-inspired plaid for a touch of old-school cool.

name: Tiered sleeveless maxi dress in Ratti® scarf paisley
description: With a gorgeous print from Italy's Ratti print house (home to some of the world's most amazing motifs since 1945), this tiered dress will be a total showstopper at any occasion.

name: Scattered Daisies Print Cashmere Crewneck Sweater
description: An ultra-wearable pullover sweater gets prettied up in a scattered-daisies print with color-pop tipping on the collar.

name: Leopard V-Neck Sheath Dress
details: True to size.
description: The season's newest neutral comes through in mildly wild style in this sheath dress cut from stretch cotton to a slightly longer, office-friendly length.

name: End on End Boy Shirt
details: True to size.
description: Like the menswear-classic button-down shirt but made just for you, now in a supersoft end-on-end cotton.

name: Hudson Drapey Velvet Top
description: Lustrous velvet, draped detailing and a fits-like-a-glove cinched waist make this camisole an RSVP-ready piece for every event on your calendar.

name: Herringbone Wool Miniskirt
details: True to size.
description: A short (but not too short!) and slimming silhouette in a structured, polished and easy-to-move-in wool that's perfect for now and cooler days ahead.

name: Studded wrap sandals
description: A super comfy lace-up gladiator sandal in Italian-made leather, and with a studded bottom for that extra something-something.

name: J.Crew Mercantile scoopneck tissue tank top
description: Yes, the customer-favorite tissue tank is back. Made from our supersoft and lightweight tissue cotton and finished with a twisted neckline and a slightly rounded hem, this is a year-round must-have. (We made them in a bunch of colors, so feel free to stock up!)

name: Pointed toe high-heel ankle boots in suede
description: A not-too-tall heel and classic suede finish put these ankle boots a step above the rest. Bonus: An interior zipper makes them easy to take on and off.

name: Sea Star Beachwear® Beachcomber espadrille water shoes in dark navy
description: These versatile, water shoe espadrilles take you from beach to street without breaking a sweat thanks to a water-friendly neoprene upper, cap-toe detailing and a sturdy, rubber sole. Sea Star Beachwear has been creating water-sport style espadrilles since 2015. Shop more Sea Star Beachwear styles.

name: Bembien® Jeanne leather woven market tote bag
description: Bembien is a collection of woven bags handcrafted by artisans from around the world. Ten percent of all Bembien proceeds go to Nest, a nonprofit dedicated to the social and economic advancement of artisan communities all around the globe. Made from Buffalo nubuck, this luxurious twist on a classic French market tote makes the perfect companion for everything from cross-country flights to coffee runs.

name: Leather belt with tortoise buckle
description: With a cool tortoise buckle, this belt is exactly what your summer dresses are missing.

name: Espadrille platform slides
description: We're calling it: It's the summer of the espadrille. They're comfortable (and versatile) enough to wear sunup to sundown, from strolling around the office to walking along the pier. Note: All espadrilles are made from natural fibers that absorb water—so please don't wear them in the rain!

name: Leopard Long Sleeve Pleated Dress
details:
True to size.
44" length (size 6)
Front button closure
Bateau neck
Long sleeves with ruffle cuffs
Removable sash
Lined, except sleeves
100% polyester
Machine wash, tumble dry
Imported
description: With cute details like a ruffle cuff, bow-tie sash and pleated skirt, this leopard dress is the one to wear when you want to feel a little fancy—on a Tuesday.

name: Cross-strap flat sandals in mirror metallic leather
description: Everything you want in a sandal: strappy, supportive and with some personality, thanks to the mirror metallic finish. Not to mention, they're made in Italy!

name: Slim boyfriend jean in hydrangea blue wash
description: Our slim boyfriend jeans are tailored perfectly for you, with an easy fit through the hip and thigh and a slim (but not too slim) leg. This pair is made from premium Italian denim with just the right amount of stretch.

name: Loeffler Randall® Marla square shoulder bag
description: Loeffler Randall founder Jessie Randall founded her NYC-based line in 2005 with the belief that "creativity drives us forward." So it's no surprise her line of shoes and bags are defined by fun, unexpected designs that feel both whimsical and easy to wear. This shoulder bag, for instance, includes bamboo hardware and a chic chain strap.

name: Laney slingback pumps in wool with leather cap toe
description: Introducing Laney, our new mid-heel pump with an easy slingback style and a chic pointed toe. Polished but comfy, for those days you find yourself running from one appointment to the next. Bonus: classic grey wool and a contrasting patent leather cap toe.
